comment: It's simple to use, charges very fast charging and isn't bulky. Make sure your PS4 controllers have the appropriate USB port at the base of the controller and not in the front of the controller otherwise it won't fit on the charging deck. Some controllers don't have the same set up as the stock PS4 controllers do re: USB and earphone ports. I know, I had to return one the other day and re-order the correct one for the deck.

I was using usb cords to keep my controllers charged but this is a game changer. No more wires while I play. It charges a full charge in around 2 hours. It is small enough that it will sit on any shelf or table. I love the fact that when it is charged it turns itself off.  My one controller would not charge through a usb cable but with this item it will now charge up and hold the charge. You will not regret buying it.

Got this charger cuz the charging cables for my controllers were busted, and I thought it'd make sense to upgrade to a charger dock so there aren't cords everywhere.The charging dock is compact with an easy to understand and intuitive display. My controllers charged and work perfectly!

For too long I had an awful way of charging my controllers, and it discouraged me from playing PS4. Now I can comfortably charge both of my controllers so they are ready to go at all times. The price was awesome. The only complaint I can give is it didn't come with a USB cord. I can let that slide because I needed a really long cord anyways and would have had to rebuy the cord to fit the space I put it.

This product has been great so far. It charges my controllers quickly, the display is bright and it's very easy to determine whether they are charged or not. The only thing is that because the charger is very narrow, I feel like I have to be careful when placing the controllers on there. I have accidentally turned the PS4 back on before, and also dont want to mess up the port which sticks off of the base by not being careful.

Its sort of difficult to get the controllers on the charging port, but once on it charges.  It is supposed to show the status of charging controllers, but mine seems to just show random green or red controller indicators.  Sometimes I will plug in a controller and the other indicator will turn red.  I am not sure what the issue is, but it is working otherwise.

Let me start by saying I made sure my USB charger block was the correct corresponding voltage.I left my controller on this charger for about four hours. I went to pick up my controller and it was too hot to touch. The controller reeks of burned/melted plastic and had gotten so hot that it made cracking noises as it cooled down. My controller is broken. I'm beyond upset because I check reviews.

BEBONCOOL PS4 CONTROLLER DEUL SHOCK CONTROLLER CHARGING STATION has arrived & i have recieved it. The only reason why i have not used it yet to try it out....is because i have not yet bought one &/or 2 exstra playstation Deul Shock controllers to use it with & to test it with the Beboncool Ps4 Deul Shock controller charging station Yet! & that is all i can tell you! & yes Bebcool charging station is pluggable into the front of the Ps4 Pro!
I have been using Nyko chargers since the PS3 and Xbox 360.They have been great, unfortunately due to design flaws of Sony the newer PS4 chargers forced me to look elsewhere.

So my first impression of this product was that it wasn't going to work, but it does.I ordered it as a Christmas gift and was somewhat disappointed by the packaging and then the fact the product was so light I wondered if it would even work, but it did!

So far, so good. We’ve been using this charger stand for months and had no problems at all. If I had to knitpick, it’s a little hard to place the controller in the back slot if there’s a controller still in front. But that’s so minor. And only because the controllers go in at a slight angle so it’s a little hard to line up without seeing. I still like the stand and like that it uses the bottom jack instead the top.

PS4 ChargerMy wife broke my last charger while trying to plug in the controller after play Sims 4. So I turned to handy Prime to find me a replacement hopefully she couldn’t break. Turns out this one is a lot better. It has multicolored lights, a fast charge, and an easy to use design. I have to admit I like this one a lot more than my last one.

After setting up the charger and placing my controller on there for a brief period of time I tested it. The controller was extraordinarily hot to the touch. My controller would not turn on at all so I attempted to resync it to my ps4. Upon plugging in the controller I discovered that it still wasn't turning on. I am out of a $60 controller due to a poor quality unlicensed product.

We have tried other chargers and this one is the best.  I like the fact that it uses the ports on the bottom of the controller instead of the smaller plug on the top like my older charger.  A little easier to place it in the charger.  The lights on the front are nice to see the charging status.  Plus it looks great sitting on our entertainment center.  I would buy again.

Bought this on a wim as one of those amazing deals, it’s actually really nice quality all around. Sturdy, expensive look, works great. No problems setting two controllers on which I’ve had with other dual chargers. Lights up to tell you that it’s contected correct. Definitely a nice purchase.

I like how you can fit two controllers in a small area and they are kept tidy, however I've gone through two units and neither work correctly.The first unit would only charge a controller in port #2. I've tried switching controllers in case there was an issue with the controller, but only port #2 would charge a controller.  Port #1 would remain lit (green light on face turned on), but would never switch to red to indicate charging like port #2 would.  The indicator light on the controller indicating the controller was charging wouldn't light up either when plugged into port #1. Tried replacing the USB cable that connects the charging station to no avail.

I have purchased the product recently and it came quite fast and looked perfect. The product design was good and the way controllers sit on the product is very stable and I was really happy with the purchase but unfortunately after few days the charging port started to malfunction and I never actually moved the product it was straight out of box to the wall shelf. I was extremely disappointed and stopped using it since it wasn't charging anymore unless I  hold the charger cable upwards. AND THIS IS THE PART WHERE I BECAME HAPPY AGAIN.And just yesterday I received email about reviewing the product and I wrote almost exactly what I wrote above. And immediately after few minutes I received email from the company's customer service which he/she was concerned about my satisfaction and asked they can make me happy by replacing the product or full refund. And it actually made my day. From time to time I face crappy or defected products from amazon and never received contact back like this. They immediately shipped new product to my address and I am waiting for the non-defected one right now. I really liked the design of this product because the way controllers sit on it seems to be safe for the jack for long term usage and it really is if you purchase it and use it. The charging lights are so useful also. And since they replaced my defected product so fast with quality tested one I have nothing bad to say about this product. GREAT VALUE FOR YOUR MONEY PEOPLE. I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS SELLER.

**edit**I wanted to give this a 5 star rating but all of a sudden the front charging port is defective and will not charge either of the controllers. The back one works great. Every time I pick up a dead controller off of the defective port I am irritated. The reason it is so irritating is because there is no response from the seller regarding this issue, AND NOW I see that this device is recommended by Amazon! Are you joking?? All these reviews stating the device is defective and you’re still recommending this product? I am a prime member, but this product broke just after the return deadline. BTW We purchased this June 2020. It’s July 2020. Do not purchase.

I wanted to wait until I have used this product for a sufficient amount of time before writing a review. Some products may seem very good at first but will tear up soon after. However, that was not the case with this product. I have been using it for quite some time now, and I have had no issues with it at all. It charges my controllers very quickly and efficiently, and does not over charge when i leave them plugged in. One thing that could be better is if it came with a wall plug instead of a USB only. Also, thing looks pretty sleek sitting next to my PlayStation.

I kind of wasn't expecting to have to buy a charger for a controller. The last PS I had was the PS2. There I was playing KH3 when I saw the message "low battery". Silly me! I thought it needed a physical battery.  Plugged into my PC without a problem. So far I've charged the controller once and its lasted days.  That's longer than my phone holds a charge. So I was happy with the charger. It arrived in a couple of days and I didn't have to wait long to tune into the magnificent journeys and adventures of Sora, Donald, and Goofy!

I was terrified by kids would stand on the perpetually dangling USB cords attached to our PS4 and it would wind up being yanked off the TV stand.  This little gizmo resolves that, tidied up the ugly cords and now lives next to our couch so I can avoid the 24 steps of exercise I need to take to switch controllers.  We really like it.  The kids struggle to get the controllers attached sometimes but overall we couldn't be (much) happier.

This very well may be the best thing I've purchased in a long time. Plugs right into your PS4 or power brick (not included) and works just like it says! Also has some nice rubber grips on the bottom of it to keep it from sliding off of a table or whatever it sits on. Lights on the front of the charger tell you when your controller is fully charged. It even shows you a status on how charged the controller(s) is!

I read all the great reviews.  Have had mine two weeks and it won't charge anything.  Checked the cord, even bought a new USB for it, didn't fix it.  Even a dead controller, shows green that it's fully charged.  It's such a pain to return such a low ticket item so will just toss and try a different one I guess.  I've never really had a defective product except once in 10 years here so I'm very disappointed.

I bought this and a new controller. Charged the new controller on it and it will no longer sync or stay on. Do not buy. Just use the cord to charge your controllerUPDATE: If this happens I found a solution to fix it. Take the dock set the controller in the dock while the dock is plugged it. Take the charging cable plug it into the PS4 and while the controller is setting in the charging dock plug the charging cable into it as well so that you’ve got two different sources of charge and then the controller will automatically sync and turn on with the PS4. (:

My young kids jacked up the micro USB charging ports on the front of the controllers. This charging station was a life saver. The charging ports are much more durable, easier for them to seat to charge, and has the red/green indicator for charging. This was an excellent investment from keeping me having to go buy new PS4 controllers due to the micro USB ports breaking. I highly recommend this above using the standard charging ports.

The lights only show green, even when you plug a completely dead controller in it. One that had been on the dock for a week. We rarely use our PS4 so I didn’t realize it wasn’t working until outside the return window. I should have gone with my first instinct that it wasn’t operator error.

I bought this for my teenager son to keep his 2 controllers charged.In the past I've lost over 4 controllers because the batteries went dead and my kids were too lazy to keep them charged. Not any longer!

I bought this for my kids to go with their new PS4 they got for Christmas.  Right out of the box the lights didn’t work according instructions.  After putting both BRAND NEW controllers on the charger the controllers no longer worked.  They wouldn’t turn on at all.  My children were upset not to be able to use their Christmas present.  Major disappointment!!!!!  Thanks to this crap product I now have to spend $100 on new controllers!!!  Do not waste your money on this product!

This works exactly as I had hoped it would. The last charging cord got destroyed when the robot vacuum ran it over, so I opted for something that would charge both controllers at the same time, so we could alternate. Bonus, that the lights indicate when the controller is charged. Side note, I have a toddler who likes to play with the controllers, and has actually dropped the charging station (on the second day we had this) and caused something to come loose, but it still works.

I revived a "DOBE" brand charger. Which I guess isn't that bad but I picked this one specifically because it didn't have an obnoxious brand label across the front. I don't see the point in wasting my electricity on the led lights that are used to illuminate some generic brand name. Besides that, there are no 1 and 2 distinctions between the controllers as shown in the pictures and the indicators are backward. Meaning when I plug the controller into the rear charger the front light is what is used to indicate whether it's charging or not. But on the bright side, it seems to be charging the controller. I only have one at the moment so I can't really speak to its ability to charge both at the same time yet. I like that it charges through the bottom usb port instead of the top. Other charging stations have you setting the controller on upside down which looks really stupid. So if the product was actually what the pics and description show I would be very happy with it. But getting something different than what you expected is a little disappointing. Update: I had them replace the item thinking maybe it was just the I got. Plus one of the chargers stoped working. But when I got the new one it was the same as the first one. Charging indicators are backwards and it just looks different than the picture. I’ll add a picture of the front controller charging.

This product does not look like much when compared to the other chargers out there, however; I ordered one and it works great.  Here are the cool features.  You do not have to plug it into your PS4, you can plug it into any other USB charger and this way you do not have to have the controllers next to the PS4.  The status of GREEN and RED are great to know if your controller is ready to go, and also once your controller is fully charged, you do not have to worry about overcharging.  Very compact and barely noticeable on display.

This charger comes with instructions only electronics technicians will likely be able to use.  You will need to purchase a separate 2A 5v USB charger for this device, commonly included with many mobile phones and other USB powered devices.  It might work with your PS4, but those ports are not designed to provide enough power.  It won't hurt your PS4, but it also may not work.The charge port to connect to your controller is built to support SONY controllers only, as they have used a plastic peg to rest the weight of the controller on the audio jack, along with USB micro connector.  This is a hard no for people using PC versions of the PS4 controller, unless it is a cloned version with the audio jack and USB port right next to each other in the same orientation.

This is a great charger, it charges the PS4 controllers through the mic input at the bottom of the controller instead of the USB port at the top. This is useful for controllers that have gone dead and cannot be recharged, which is the reason I bought this in the first place. I was able to revive a dead controller that I had otherwise given up on. The only thing I did not like about it was that its power cord is a simple USB plugin rather than a real power adapter that goes into a wall socket. I was expecting it to plug into a power outlet so that I wouldn't have to charge my controllers from my PS4. However, a convenient workaround for this is to get a power adapter for USBs that plug into a wall socket. So instead of charging my controllers through my PS4 or PC, I can plug the USB end of the charger into a power adapter that plugs into the wall. I would definitely recommend this charger.
UpdateGreat customer service from the company. Quick responses and they are willing to do whatever is necessary to fix production. That's enough for me.
THIS IS EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED. BUT BEWARE, IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOUR PLAYSTATION USB PORTS FREE, GET YOURSELF A USB ADAPTER AND PLUG THIS UP IN THE WALL OUTLET BECAUSE THIS DOESN'T COME WITH ONE

Got this as a present from my gf and let me just tell u she hit a nail on the head. Its sleek, looks very well made, the indicator is awesome, installing the controller to charge is easy and dont have to fight it like other chargers. also very compact, saves space on my small desk. very glad she got me this because i would of went with something more expensive, stupid me because this little guy handles its job extremely well. do recommend it

So much better than a cable. And it looks cool. Apparently dimming the lights on your controller will make the battery last alot longer.  But I dont have that problem Because I'm  to busy with life to play that long.  Life ain't about video games.  Go out and do something

I purchased this 4 months ago and it works great to charge my controller's. It charges from the front of the controller and doesn't use the micro USB on the back. The main problem I run into with these types of chargers is it tends to break the micro USB but because you're using the port on the front it works allot better-putting the controllers into the base station.

Not only does this dock work awesome, it’s looks pretty cool next to my PS4! It is very convenient and it is an accessory that I have been missing out on. I really love that it charges using the bottom headphone ext port, rather than struggling to use the micro USB port at the top. I highly recommend this dual charging dock for those looking for a sleek looking space saver!

Brilliant little gadget for a great price and does the job!  Before my kids were hooking their remote control up to the actual PS4 which meant they were really close to the TV but now having this little gadget life is so much easier.  It didn't come with the actual plug but it did come with the cable so I used a plug I already had and have it plugged into the wall so the remotes can charge 24/7.  I would highly recommend this as it's small and takes up no space.

I bought this for my DualShock 4 controllers that are connected via Bluetooth to my Steam PC rig. For some reason, I have inconsistent results when attempting to charge them via microUSB cable, so I found I was having to keep them connected to a cable in order to use them. That is, until I found this handy charging station! Controllers can now charge in a reasonable amount of time (I'm usually never in a hurry and tend to rotate controllers). No more empty batteries!

This almost caused a fire. Owned for 6 months without issues. Worked very well UNTIL it melted. My kids smelled something  burning in the basement. We found the micro usb charger melting at the point of connection to the device. Could have caused a serious fire. Recommend AGAINST buying this product.

When you set the controllers on the charger you  have to wiggle and fight to get them connected. Sometimes the charger  shows green lights meaning the controllers are charged, but they actually are not.  Very disappointed, will be looking for a better charger.

So first, let me tell you, I am not a gamer, but every member of my family is and I bought each of my kids and my husband one of these for Christmas. They have all loved them so far. The controllers stay charged and ready to be swapped out when they are doing long hours of online gaming. They haven't had any complaints about how they work and have been quite happy with how little room it takes up and how will it charges the controllers. I am happy that I don't need to trip over the cords that are no longer attached to the console trying to charge the controller while still playing..... just saying.

At first, it seemed like the perfect solution for charging my two controllers are once. And it worked as expected. Battery life was about the same as when I used a regular wall charger from what I could tell.But now it's about 2 months later and one of the ports stopped charging completely. Can't say I will buy this same product again.

My husband and I use our remote all day. Before we bought this product we'd have to wait for the remotes to charge and be left high and dry in the middle of a gaming session or a TV binge. As well, you had to leave the PS4 on all the time to charge the remote. But now we always have a fully charged remote even if the PS4 is off. Easy and simple to use. Installation is idiot proof. Even my mom (bless her heart!) can put the remote on the charger without confusion or struggle--and she just learned how to turn on a laptop a year ago. Highly recommended.

I like the product, nice handy place to keep my controllers when i am not using them too. Only problem is that i feel they have decreased my battery life on my controllers which is a problem but i always have another controller charged and ready to go. I just do not like knowing they have a shorter battery life cause of it. But beats the hell out of plugging a usb cable. Only major players should purchase this.

Ever since controllers went wireless, I had to have a charging dock like this. This is the most recent one for the current Playstation.  They get better every generation. This one's pretty good.  The controllers aren't a big hassle to situate.  They sit neatly.  The charging notification lights work, but are reversed for which controller is charging. which isn't major.  It's better than unsightly cables.

I really like this thing but apparently it doesn’t want to charge the controllers. We have tried it for 2 days now and thee controllers don’t want to charge. It will show its charging but not actually charge... not sure what to do at this point and it doesn’t seem to work :( it sucks because we were looking forward to these

This is a great buy for the price. I use to have one that stood up and used the micro usb in the back to charge but not with this one. You use the front plug in to charge and its much more sturdy in my opinion by plugging it in the front. The controllers fit well in the cradle and the way it lights up in the front to let you know that it is charging. I would recommend this to anyone that is looking for a charging stations.Pros:

**update 4/22/19**The company sent me a replacement after the first failure. The replacement is corrected with the controller placement and both ports do charge, though touchy. I've changed my rating from a 2 to a 4 star. Only reason for not giving 5 stars is I do not trust it to continue to function properly.

I am not real sure about this charger.  The USB Charger card is SHORT, really short if you are wanting to leave them by the TV, an extra foot would have been great, I had to dig a cord out of the spare wire box.  Its tricky putting the controllers on there.  My husband has a VR storage rack in the other room and they clip right into that one., but this one takes effort.  I clipped both controllers into it and it showed Green lights right away, and I am pretty sure one wasn't fully charged.  My assessment:  Its just OK, and its cheap. If it gets a red light when charging and gives a good battery life, I'll come back and give it another star.

I bought this and I don't have any real misgivings about buying it.  It works and one of it's features I really like is that when you plug in a dead controller it shows a red light to indicate which controller is presently charging.  I like that.  What is a constant annoyance is when I have to plug it in it's a bit of a "lets jiggle the controller until it actually sits on the charging plug correctly" dance.  A minor inconvenience, but still annoying.  They could have done a better design job to ensure a more seamless transition for charging.  This thing is sturdy, has some decent weight to it, doesn't move all over and I really like the light indicators which stay on.  I'd buy again for a cheap price.

I love this product and want to recommend it to all buyers out there because it is really well made and great quality, unlike some other controller chargers available. I always know that my controller is at 100 percent when I get it to start my gaming. I love that. The design is durable, but it takes getting used to. Although the controllers slide on as they should, it took a long time to get used to how to angle the controller exactly right in the dark for it to slide on. When we first got the charger, it took some aggravation to get the controllers on it. But once you get used to it, it's no longer an issue. So I feel like the design is super durable and reliable. It's good quality. But, on the other hand, it seems to me that the design needs to be perfected so that it is easier to slide the controllers on there while still being durable. But, overall, because of the high quality and reliability, I highly recommend this charger over others on the market.
This is an initial review after 1 month of usage.So far so good.
I don’t like paragraphs, so here we go:- Multiple remotes: If you have a PlayStation and you have multiple remotes, believe me, you need this.
What I like:My PS4 no longer needs to be on to charge my controllers and the annoying sleep mode won't interrupt the charging.

I was excited to buy this for my son, who had always charged his controllers with the console itself. I read good reviews and the price was good. It's pretty durable. Easy to use. I'm not sure if I have a defective one or not, but this unit charges the controllers and even though it says they're fully charged, they're not. He takes them off to use them and within about 15 minutes, they're dead. I am not a gamer but I'm pretty sure a fully charged controller should last longer than that.

Without a doubt the best PS4 charger on Amazon. It charges via the front port of the controller as opposed to the back USB port.The charging port alone makes this the best controller, but because it even has a charger Red/Green illuminated light makes these even better!

So far so good. Super easy to plug in and it’s functional for even a child to take it right out the box and connect it. The chargers I normally buy my son eventually break away from the port and I find myself buying quite a few charges. So when I saw this I decided to give it a try. It’s perfect, he can charge a couple at a time and he’s not constantly pulling at the wire while it’s charging. Normally he plays with the remote as it’s charging, but now with a double charger as he’s playing the other one is charging. Love it

never have a dead controller again. hang any Sony controller for PS pro ps4 slim or PS 4 on this charging base. be sure you have the charging ports in the middle of the controller in between the two thumb sticks will be a slot and a hole to the right which holds the controller in the charger. the chargers display will light up  red while charging then change green when fully charged.its been my experience that only official Sony PS 4 controllers have these ports some after market controllers do not have these ports. if your controller doesn't have these ports to hang it on this charging station do not by this charging station it will not work.

This charger is absolutely great.  I had held off on one of these forever because I always just plug the controller into the cord coming from the system while playing.  Won't get a dead battery that way.  But, recently I've been taking notice of how I dislike always having gaming cords on the floor, or, having to remember to unhook them and put them away every time I finished playing.  This is a cheap charger.  It isnt particularly fast, but since I have a 2nd controller, even if the one I'm using runs out of juice I have no worries.  It's been nicer than I realized to not have to deal with always plugging in the charging cord when I want to play video games, so I most definitely recommend this.

Okay mommas of boys that love to play ps4 YOU NEED THIS!! My sons are 4&10 and they always somehow mess up or break the paddle charge wires I have no idea how they do it but I was on our 3rd set of wires to charge our paddles when I can across this miracle thing! It’s sooooooo EASY FOR MY 4 year old to slide right into the charging port I mean super easy you don’t need any kind in knowledge it just fits perfectly!! It tells us when it’s low , full, and when it’s charging! It keeps the idles safe and secure so they don’t fall off their gaming desk. I seriously love this thing! Don’t hesitate just buy it especially for the price !!

Great product so far and works as described.I had a nyko controller charger before this that used both usb ports on the ps4 and only had usb 2.0 pass through ports.  So I had to stop using it when I added an external hard drive for games.
I bought two of these for my four controllers.They've worked great for about 6 months then one of them started going bad.

Product arrived on time. Does not include a plug in for wall outlet, just a USB cord, which is disappointing since devices like these should always come with one. Charging indicating lights are simple but one issue I've had on initial use is the lights keep switching back and forth between red and green. The instructions are so brief and basic it does not indicate what this means and I can't tell if its actually charging, having an issue, or fully charged. I only just set this up so an update on my review might come later.Overall the product seems simple, easy to set up, and works, but lacks a wall plugin, instruction manual is so brief and basic when issues come up they are useless.

The product worked great at first. It was very easy to use and more convenient than plugging the controllers using two separated mini USB cables. Unfortunately, it only lasted about 7 months and now it does not longer charge the controllers.

I was tired of charging my controllers with my PlayStation 4 USB slots and having no spare USB slot for my wireless headphone adapter. This eliminated that problem. I just bought it recently so will update if there's any issues. It was simple to use and set up. Keep in mind the cord is not very long, luckily for me I had a spare one that was long enough to reach an outlet with a phone charger box (if you are going to plug it in on the wall mount instead of directly to the game system USB slot). IF THIS MAKES ANY SENSE HAHA.07/27/2020: Update, both of my controllers are acting like they are possessed when I play. It won't let me move my character around the direction i want... now i am constantly fighting with my controller. THIS NEVER HAPPENED until I started to use this charger. I wish I could send it back. Now, I have to probably buy a new controller.

Unfortunately only one of the two charging ports working. I've tried swapping the controllers around and swapped power cables, but no luck. The lights both work, but the second charging port doesn't charge, and the light just stays red.  How frustrating!

I liked the product, until it conveniently died just a couple of weeks after the return window. As you can see in the pic, there’s no lights at all on on the charger - it’s supposed to have a red and green light. I unplugged, replugged, nothing. Cheapness I can handle, something breaking after a little over a month is not acceptable. Don’t buy this product

Says both controllers are fully charged when I know for a fact they are not. Had both controllers on for over 3 hours and nothing. Tried different plugs and wires but still doesn’t work. Keeps lighting up Green but my controllers won’t turn on. Seemed too good to be true. Don’t waste your time or money.

This product works just OK for me. The connections that are supposed to power the charging don't consistently work.  They are supposed to turn RED when charging and GREEN when charged. There are times that the rear connection doesn't work without some major jiggling. But since I typically don't charge 2 controllers simultaneously I don't have to mess with the back dock, and the front one works much better.

First charging station I've ever purchased that doesn't come with its own wall plug.  Basically says "use your own adapter...".  (you only get a REALLY short usb cord)  If you are like me, and want to charge the controllers further away from where all of your components are, this is not the charger for you, unless you want to pay another $10 for a wall charger or use one from your phone.

Waste of money. The only benefit that I got from this item was the cable it does not work when you connect the cable to the item so we can charge the controls the controls will not charge with this it does not work I thought that the first time that I purchased this in December my kids broke it the second time I bought it I realized that it was a piece of trash it’s all pretty from the outside but it does not work it looks nice but it doesn’t work I completely regret purchasing this.
The connection where they plug in are a little tight, it did not work for one of my controllers but probably because a kid shoved some stuff (probably gum) in the charging spot. Good product though.

For just over twelve bucks, this thing does exactly what I wanted it to do.Previously, I had always had a USB charging cord awkwardly draped from the front of my system to one of the controllers I haphazardly tossed on top.  The great thing about this device, for me, was just that it made it easy to run a cord BEHIND my entertainment system and into a wall socket and created a perfectly organized place to store my controllers. It charges both controllers too, and the light-up-display is neat and all, but since they now rest in this dock when not in use, I feel like they will NEVER be low on battery.

I bought two of these and one of them is great. The second one is no longer working. I noticed about 2 weeks ago that it was doing this weird flashing thing. I tried to reach out on amazon and for some reason it said that the entire item/page was no longer available. I just went to  look again, and here I am. I wish I could contact the seller but I can't find a way to. When these work, they're fantastic. The charging screens are very well done, bright and  have a sharp image.  I think that our defective one is just a dud. But still, I'm stuck with an non-functioning product.

Good to keep controllers charged and ready to use. My only complaint is that it only charges them up to 75% and stops (stated in the description). I love that it stops charging to prevent overcharging, but I wish it would stop at 80-90% of battery life. Also, the colors on the charger are a good feature to show if the controllers are charging or not.

This is kind of pointless without a 120v adapter. If you have to use the PS4 power to charge the controller then that defeats the purpose of a wireless controller, I might as well plug in the charging cable for the controller. Unless your ps4 is constantly on (which it won't be as it auto turns off) I wouldn't buy. Would be a great product had they provided 120v adapter.

Does good for charging and storing you controllers. Can be a little difficult to get them plugged in using the bottom ports. There aren't really any guides to getting the controller in the right angle to plug it in.  Also if you have any controller accessories, you will have to remove them before charging each time.

I had been meaning to buy a charging stand for a while now and now that this has arrived I'm wondering why I took so long to make the decision! The stand is nice, sturdy, and charges like the PS4. It helps that I can plug the stand cord into a usb outlet so now my PS4 usb ports are free. The light does stay red until the controller hits 100% according to the indicator on my PS4.

We thought we had 2 controllers that would no longer take a charge. (A $100 problem). We replaced he cables and still no dice. We bought this charger and it turns out it was the warbled-out jacks at the top of the controller. Plugged them in via the bottom jack and wah-lah! Keep them on there now and they are always ready. Love the 2 PS4-shaped red and green colored lights, indicating which controller is charged and which on is not. Great design, maybe the kids won’t destroy this in 10 minutes.

My kids love playing games on their PS4, but they were terrible at putting the controllers away.  Not only does this keep the controllers organized but it charges them as well.  I'll admit that I was hesitant to purchase this as I didn't think it would work.  I was wrong! Not only does it charge both at the same time, but it charges it quickly.When the lights are green it means the controllers are fully charged.  If it is still charging then the color will be red.

This is a great charger -- Main thing to know about it is probably that seating your controller on there is smooth and easy.  I've had ones that were a bit fiddly in the past with the connectors, but this one works perfectly and the controllers are guided by the design right to their target.  Excellent.  I need to check if they make something similar for my Move Controllers, now!  :D

My kiddos got excited about a game they are playing and pulled the charger from its port as it was connected to the controller at the time. And it broke.We jump online and found one of reasonable pricing yet charged wirelessly. We found the Benboncool because it is cool. My 8 yr old hooked it up and was playing in 15 minutes. When he said mom it’s charged, I couldn’t believe. My kids are home due to the COVID-19 and I need things to work fast!!!!! Best Buy ever. Now I need to buy one more controller so I can play!

I bought this product five months ago and it’s been great. It’s only been in two places the entire time I’ve had it and hasn’t been moved or wiggled around but for some reason the cord has stopped working well. I have to move the cord around to get it to charge and the second I let go of it, it turns back off which is leaving my controllers only getting charged to one bar.

Unless I am completely confused, the "BEBONCOOL PS4 Controller Charger, Controller USB Charging Station Dock" is NOT compatible with the "PlayStationPS4 Controller ORDA Wireless Gamepad for Playstation 4/Pro/Slim/PC and Laptop".The charging dock has a plastic peg adjacent to the charging connection and there is NOT an equivalent  hole in the ORDA controler for the peg to fit into.

I've only had it for a month in July of 2020, so I have no idea how well it will last in the year(s) ahead, but this has solved the issue of my children plugging in and unplugging controllers without damage.  The guidepost that fits in the 3.5mm jack makes sure the charging port is lined up everytime.  Without a doubt, I'll be purchasing a similar product for PS5.

These definitely are cheap and very light they don't hold a charge for very long they randomly lose their connection to the PlayStation. 1 PlayStation controller fully charged last longer than both of these together fully charged but if you just want some friends to come over and play for a little while and have an extra controller they're a good deal

This device works as advertised, it looks sleek and removes burden from charging controllers. I have my gaming setup all at my desk, this device was a nice addition. I have two controllers that i virtually always keep on this dock and I have had ZERO issues. The devices charge relatively quick. I would recommend to any and all who are looking for a device like this, its a great deal for the low price!

Works great! My youngest has an issue with smashing the charging cord in upside down and I'm terrified that he is going to wreck the charging port on the controller. With this I no longer have to worry. It charges quickly and it's as simple as laying the controller down on the port. Perfect for younger kiddos. Good buy for a really great price.

This docking stand is so freaking cool. Super simple plug in, and it holds the controls steady so they don't fall off like other PS4 controller docking mounts. I also like that it shows you when the battery is fully charged. Would definitely buy another if I had more controllers.

Works great! Charges fast. Sooo much easier than trying to charge with a micro USB cord. They never stay plugged in and wreck the charger cord with constant unplugging and plugging in.  Controllers stay charged since I can just put it on the dock whenever it's not being used.

I’ve used this charger for a little over a month and it started out working perfectly. Now, however it no longer changes colors to show you the battery life of your controller. I just turned on my PS4 and both chargers were “green” meaning charged, but one was totally dead. Now that I’m outside of the return window I’m stuck with it. Look elsewhere.

When my son told me a week before Christmas this was his hearts desire I was worried about if i could find it or not. Amazon to the rescue . I found it easily , since I am a Prime member it came in 2 days! It works perfectly and my son was delighted. It's all he uses to charge his controllers now.

This charger is a great value for what you get. It does charge really fast and for some reason my controllers seem to last longer between charges, over at the stock USB charger. Not sure if that is even possible but seems that way. It doesn't take up much space and looks nice. You can tell from a distance when you're controller is ready. I see no cons so far. The only thing in question would be the longevity.

Only one of the two chargers work. I contacted the company and they took my information and then never responded. If they contact me and let me return and exchange, or send a new one then I will change my rating. Until the, I will give it two stars. Its easy to use, small, and seems pretty sturdy. Would be a great product if it worked 100%.

I love this dock. It works great and is easily accessible. I keep my controllers on my nightstand so I can just reach over and grab one and replace it once it dies. The lights show when its charging and when it's good. The controllers shut off charging automatically once they're done so I can just leave them there like a caddy. I love it. No more fussing with wires or running to the system.

It charges the controller fast. Small and has sleek look. However, I noticed if I leave the controller plugged in and turn off the PS4, the controller will lose its charge. So, I have to unplug the controller after the charging is complete. I was hoping to use the charging station as a docking station but I don't think it's possible.

This charger is perfect for the space we have! It’s really easy to place the PS4 controllers on the charger and remove them. The front shows a green (fully charged) or red (not fully charged) light so my son can easily tell when they are done charging and ready for use. We had the stackable charger before and it was too tall and much harder to plug in the controllers.

Works perfectly except the charging indicator lights are backwards. The front light is for the back controller and the back light is for the front controller. This was a little confusing until I realized what was going on, but doesn't impact how they actually charge. A handy person could probably open it up and swap the wiring around if it bothered them that much.

It looks... really cheap honestly and the LED's are completely wrong on it, but for the price, its been very reliable and works well. It even fixed one of my controllers that my wife bricked by plugging it into her "fast charge" phone charger. I thought that controller was doomed until I read somewhere these dock chargers can possible fix it... and it did. Happy with the purchase, would recommend.

So. One day shipping was great but the fact that the unit came with a charging cable that did NOT fit into the unit is a problem. I had my own extra cord to test the actual unit, but what if I didn’t? Now I would have to go through all the trouble of returning it. Smh. Unacceptable. Makes me feel like these units are refurbished but not labeled as that

I feel like some of the best products on Amazon are the most simple because you know what you're paying. Great Value, super easy to use, no noticeable issues thus far.I like how the controller indicates when the battery is charge "red mode" and when the battery is fully charged "green mode", one for each controller slot of course.
Everything is fine all but 1 thing you need 2 hands to remove the controller because the charging pin is super tight it feels like the charging pin could brake off if your not careful

I bought this as a surprise gift for my son. Although he never asked for a charging dock I felt that it would be very handy to have one place where you can charge both your controllers simultaneously rather than having to switch the charging cable between two different controllers. The shipping was prompt and item arrived well packaged. My son (13yrs) was able to unpack and set it up all by himself. I think he had a little help from the instructions included with the product but for the most part it was pretty straight forward. The build quality of the dock exceeded my expectations considering how much I paid for it. It works well with both controllers and the little icons in the front can tell you if any of the controller is not docked correctly which could happen occasionally if you are in a hurry. Overall I am very satisfied with this product and how it has worked so far. Will definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for PS4 controller charging dock.

I don't used them so I don't really know much.  However, I helped my sons put their controller to charge once a while and seems to work okay.  Sometimes, looks like its done charge because of showing green light but once touch, the light turn red again (which means need charge).  I guess the port aren't tight enough so might be loosing.

This thing isn’t charging my controller. The console says the controller has half charge but the device itself just stays green and doesn’t charge the controller.I’ve tried with console on and asleep. I’ve tried different USB ports in the front. The controller isn’t recognized by the device or just doesn’t work at all.

This controller charger was purchased as a Christmas gift for myself. However, I dont play video game's but I can say I haven't tripped, step on a controller nor tumbled over with my laundry since December 25th. It charges well and my teen boy's are also very happy with this gift. It arrived on time and would recommend this item and vendor for this purchase. Happy New Year Everyone 😅

This is very useful when the ports on the back of the controllers are loosened enough to prevent charging that way. This charger uses the port on the front of the controller instead, so I no longer need to struggle with getting the other port on the controller to work. Just be very careful with the charging cable port on this unit, as it can become loosened too. Now I never use this device's cable for anything else, so as to not loosen the port.

I had ordered this almost six months ago and at first loved it because it was exactly what I was looking for and for a great price. It has now stopped working. I plug in dead controllers and it says they’re charged and they don’t charge. Which really sucks because I liked it so much initially I had just ordered a second one as a gift and now I’m concerned.

The top USB port on my controller stopped working and this product was just what I needed.  It allows me to charge the controller via the bottom EXT port and now I don't have to pay money to purchase an entire new controller.  It also works as a great stand to store my controllers, oppose to just leaving them lying around.

This item was trash did not charge controllers at all....it would say they were charged but when I turned them on they would say needs charging...I should have returned them but though it was no worth the effort....

Because i have three controllers i needed to have a means to easily keep them charged up as often only one will be in use at any time, thus having a dual charger that does the job and looks well and needs only one USB slot is why I purchased this unit and it uses the better connectionat the rear  than the small SONY type plug at the front .  The charge indication lights are also a good thing to have a syou get a view of what is being charged

I bought this so I could charge two controllers at once. Within a month it would only charge the front controller. I still use it to hold two of them out of the way, but when when is charged I switch them to charge the second one. Because I was not aware of the problem at first, I did not contact the company.

379/5000After many attempts to try to locate the package, it was never located at the indicated address. Other products were bought in the same order, if they were delivered. The problem was not the delivery address, it was with USPS.

Ever since we started using it one of my controllers stopped charging completely. I can pop it on there and the light will turn red to show it’s “charging” but then immediately turn green and never actually charge the controller. The other one is fine though. So there’s really a 50/50 chance this works.

This works great was looking for a replacement charger instead of the old cell phone style one I had before which wore out the connector in the control and had a hard time charging. This one uses the more solid input on the remote control located by the d pad.

I bought this because I was tired of having android cables go out on me and on top of that the ports on these controllers can be so finicky. The controllers rest very easily in the stand and charging speed is no different from a hardline. Do keep in kind that if you're planning on keeping this connected to your ps4 they will only charge if it is on or in resting mode, I keep it plugged in to my desktop so this isn't really a problem for me. Overall I'm extremely happy with this purchase.

Kids lost the dongle for my old PS4 charger which isn't hard considering how small that bit is. This charger plugs directly into the PS4 and does not require a dongle. Simply plug it in and let it charge. Show red controller icon if needing a charge and shows green when good to go. Works like a charm.

I had an issue with charging on one of the ports but I contacted the seller directly and they were able to assist me by sending me a new one. They were very quick at sending my replacement and provided great customer service. With this new device, I can highly recommend this item. No issues!

I've had this for about 4 months now, overall it's working and it's been working. Looks pretty cool too. I've always had problems of putting my controls to charge but that problem is gone cuz now I just mount them whenever I stop playing. I also connected it to my TV so whenever someone watches TV they charge.

I am absolutely loving this charger because it’s super easy to use and even my 1 year old can plug in a controller to charge. There are no parts that can be broken off easily. It’s durable and it’s easy to know when the controller is charged. This is my favorite PlayStation charger. We have tried so many of them but this is the best so far.

This thing charges fast even during gameplay. I'm not even joking, my controller died in the middle of a fight in Monster Hunter (Yes I ignored the "Almost dead" notification) that you can't pause so I hurriedly connected the controller to this base and defeated the monster around 10 minutes later. And I am dead serious that it was fully charged and working around 3 or 4 hours after.The only issue With this is that you can't play comfortably with it charging, but if you're daring and lazy like me that won't be an issue.

I bought this for my kid who breaks and loses his controller chargers more than I break a nail. So happy that this exists so he doesn't have to set his controllers "a certain way" to make them charger anymore. A huge life saver for those who are tired of buying charging cords for their kids!

Great product! My 12 year old son loves it.  Its slim and easy to use, he set it up himselfThe front lights that shows its charging is super helpful, and I like that it's a little light up controller picture that shows up, not just some blinking little light.  I would totally recommend, it's a good value for the price too!
I was looking forward to use less cables. Unfortunately, this didn't work so not only do I have to go back to cables, money and time was also wasted.Hopefully I can help others prevent this mishap.

I absolutely love this product. Works as advertised. It is so nice to have my controllers out of the way and not plugged into the front of my PlayStation. I can put it up, away from my two year old kid and it is so handy to just grab one off the charger and go.  The cord is not very long so I added a small extension cord to give it some extra length. I would highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a controller charger. It is a low cost and does a great job. I have had no connection issues like I’ve heard in some of the negative reviews.  In fact I have nothing negative to say about it at all.  Love it.

I bought a single Power A charger which never worked correctly before I purchased this one and simple this Beboncool double charger works without a flaw.Highly recommend this one for anyone who wants a fast reliable charger. 2-3 hours and my PS4 controller is fully charges.

Wanted something better than PITA micro-B cables jammed in at the weird angle and spot Sony opted to put the port and this fits the bill. Small footprint and easy to place your controllers in to charge. What a great thing to have.Also handy to diagnose charging issues if you've already happened to fry your controller(s) by using a high amp/volt charger as used by a lot of phones- which I did and this can sometimes let you get by if your battery is still good, but the USB board or cable are bad in your controller.

I wish it didn't have the little nub to go into the headphone jack. It makes it a little hard to put it on for me. I have it on the second shelf of an entertainment center, so it is in the shadows. There's always a struggle for 2-10 seconds trying to get it situated properly. It works good and is inexpensive, though.

What a great replacement controller. I was skeptical about buying a new controller that was not name brand, but I am happy to report that I have no regrets about my purchase. I love everything about this controller. When playing a game with my kids, they all know that the "cool" controller is mine. Looking for another controller?....then look no further. This one is it.

I am using this product for a while now and I’m really liking it, it’s hassle free easy to use and I can charge both my consoles together as before I have to charge them separately and have to wait a long time also but this is fast charge is controllers are charged fast.

Got to love it when companies cut corners. Received this and went to set it up only to find out it doesn't actually come with an AC adapter. Sure I have a couple of others, but I use those! The idea is to plug this thing in, set it on my entertainment system and use it... not plug, unplug as I need to use it or need the AC adapter for one of my other devices, so I now have to buy a charger. Annoying.

Like this one. We had a different one and one of the ports stopped working after a couple of months. I like this one better because it's easy to put the chargers on and it's more compact for small spaces. We have had this for about 4 months now.

Efficient charger. Charging PS4 controllers via the system or an outlet has been an absolute pain for me - either taking way too long to charge or staying on the charger overnight and it still being dead. But with this charging dock, it is always charged and ready to play. LED indicators are amazing. Well worth it.

Wanted something for my 7 year old so he didn't have to worry about having to remember to plug in the cumbersome factory mini USB. Works great, great value, easy to use, charges fast, can charge both controllers at the same time and don't have controllers just left laying around the living room. They are neatly stored on the charger.

I bought this device and another as I often need to recharge more than two controllers.  It works very well, is easy to use and I can't think of a single negative to say about it.  If you need a recharger, you can't go wrong with this device.

Cons: sometimes it’s hard to align the controller to the charging dockPro: fast charging, and my controller stays charged a lot longer using this pod than any other ones I used. It’s also compact and can be placed anywhere without taking much space

I’ve used the charging station once now.  I used a front USB port from the front of my PC.  I use my controllers on my PS4 Pro(in the same room).  The dock had a red controller icon show up on the dock front as soon as it was attached.  The next day when I let it charge overnight the icons were green.  I didn’t measure the time it took to charge.  I will update if any issues appear.

It didn’t work, I plugged it in and charged my controls. They were both low battery. I left them charging for a few hours but the lights didn’t change color and when I checked the batteries on the console they were both exactly the same as when I started to charge them. They didn’t charge at all. Disappointed with the purchase.Update: Although it was faulty the seller reached out to me to make things right. Great customer service.

So we picked this out for our 17yr old for his ps 4 slim. The unit came with a controller and a short USB cord so we picked this unit after reading all the reviews and comparing others and prices it works well and he has given it his very kool seal of approval great buy great price

Would have given this 5 stars for the price and ease, but it will not work if plugged into the PS4 like the PS4 cables for charging, it has to be plugged into a block and a wall outlet.  It has helped with no cords hanging out of the front of the gaming system so that is nice.

Love controller charger especially since before I only have one cable charger and 3 controllers, so if I was ever playing with multiple people is could get annoying trying to have a fully charged controller. It is nice and compact so it doesn't take up too much space.

This is now a household necessity! Hubby and I can charge our controllers easily and without multiple wires. The charger is compact, which is another plus. I purpose left it out where my adult kids could see it, and they immediately ordered 2 of them for their gaming room. It was exactly what we needed!

Works great I'm worried about how long the connections to the controllers will last but will change my review if that ever happens. So far I am very pleased with this product and for the value even if something goes wrong I will more than likely buy it again

I have kids and this is THE BEST thing I have ever bought. It keeps me from having the cords all over the place, it clearly tells you if the controllers are charged or not, and even my kids can sit them on the chargers without messing it all up. Love it. So happy with this purchase.

So, so far I’ve only used it once so at the moment I’m unsure about the battery life and value of money. I saw them at five below for $5 , I’m hoping I didn’t pay more for than what it’s actually worth 🙄 we’ll see how it works in the long run though and after a few months I’ll do another review since there aren’t many reviews on an item like this. Over happy at the moment tho :)

After getting tired of our controllers being perpetually dead, I came across this item. I got it for my husband for Christmas and honestly it's the best thing I got him 😂 but really this thing is awesome and totally worth the money. It even has little lights on it that show you whether your controller is charged or not.

It works nicely and very helpful at first but you don’t realize it’s slowly breaking the controls battery or something I’ve been useing this product to charge my controllers for a while now and I’ve noticed that slowly but surely my controllers have been dying a lot faster seens I’ve used this and one by one the controllers batteries will be so messed up I can’t use it like the light on screen will be green but when I try to turn it on my PlayStation tells me it’s dead and disconnects idk what to do and I’ve trashed about 3 controller because of this like come on man controllers aren’t cheap

Plugged it in, both green lights came on. I docked the controllers and both lights stayed green even though both controllers were low. Red lights never came on at all, and flashing charging light on controllers never came on. The dock receptacles are dead.

I have Ps4 controllers with broken charging ports and can no longer charge through cords. This was a saving grace for me because now I have a way to play on my ps4 again. I definitely can tell that it stay alive much longer than if charged by the cord and also appears to charge much faster as well but that may just be because of the fact you can't properly use the controller while its charging. I would give it 5 stars but I personally never do 5 stars on amazon since it always flooded with bots but this is a great product.

As soon as you give this is power both lights turn green! You won't see red until  you put in a low charger, but I would think you wouldn't see any lights at all until a controller is plugged in. It is strange to be using the controllers and see both lights on?

Easy to use well designed.  I got a defective one and I reached out to them and I got a quick reply and they were quick to replace it. Sorry I'm just writing a review now. Had for a while and it's still great, looks great under my tv.

I was so tired of picking up my PS4 controllers to play a game and them being dead. My kids would never plug them into the cord that came with the PS4. The usual excuses being that, they forgot or couldn’t find the cord. Now, this cool looking charger sits right next to my tv with both of my controllers on top and plugged in with the green “fully charged” light on. What really sold me on this charger was all the protections it has. Over-current, Over-heated, Over-voltage, and Short-circuit protection. Great charger!

It charges my controllers. Does it job, hasn't broken yet. Easy to tell when done charging. Hard to remove controllers with one hand which is kind of important to me when I have my baby in one arm always, but im certain its not a big deal to most so I won't fault it for that. Would buy another one if I ever get more than 2 controllers

I read reviews on numerous charges, and went with this one for my son.  It came in last week, and I read the instructions carefully, and it just doesn't work.  It is showing that it has power, but it is not charging the controllers.  We've tried both charging connections, and nothing.  Really disappointed in this product.

I ordered this since I needed something more sturdy & easier to use so my kids can charge their wireless PS4 controllers. It arrived in great condition & looks exactly like the picture above. Easy to read/understand light up controller symbols to let you know when controllers are ready. It does not use batteries so you need to plug in the usb cord to the base and plug into PS4 or if your tv has a USB port then you can plug it there. The only downside is that since it does use a USB port to charge up the controllers, the power source that you have the base connected to needs to be on in order for it to work. So just keep that in mind if you plug it into the PS4. Other than that it’s a pretty good charger.

It’s perfect! We have 3 controllers so we keep 2 on the charger and use the other. When it gets low we swap them out. When we play multiplayer we don’t have to worry about if they are charged or not. Before there were times we would have 3 dead controllers. We don’t have cable so we use Netflix Vudu Hulu and Prime. You need a charged controller for that lol. So this was a perfect Christmas gift for us!!

I've bought charging stations in the past and was skeptical when I found this on a lightning deal. I must say, I was pleasantly surprised at the speed this charges controllers! The footprint is small enough to be unobtrusive, even on my tiny desk. And best of all, it feels sturdy. My prior experiences with charging stations like this left me unsatisfied. Not this one. I'd recommend it highly!

Very cool charger. You can plug the cord into a plug and plug it in the wall to charge all the time. Or you can plug it into the PS4 itself and it will charge the controls while the PS is on. If you want to plug it into the wall you will need the block since this doesn't come with it.

This has really helped with the dead controller issue we kept having in our house. Our kids would never plug the controllers in to charge and they would be dead when they wanted to go play. The simplicity of this charger is so nice! Our controllers actually get charged now, even by our 5 year old! I love this and if I get two more controllers I will get another one.

As advertised. Works well and charges the PS4 controllers without any hassles. The charging indicators on the front is a nice touch - it turns red when it’s charging and green when charged. There are two indicators for each of the controllers.

Pretty awesome and charges my controllers very easily. It could definitely work as an outlet charger, instead of using a USB slot for your PS4, and for that reason I’d love to have it come with a longer USB and wall plug. Otherwise, working as expected

Really wish we bought this sooner. The secondary charging port on the controllers is much sturdier than the usb port. This charging station is great. Now we don't lose the controllers and they get charged more reliably.

The box it arrives in does not inspire confidence. The box has numerous references to " the P4." Nowhere does it say PS4 or Playstation. It's bulkier than it looks in the picture, but not too bad. It works as discribed. I like being able to charge from the bottom. MicroUSB cables seem to wear out pretty quickly when you you plg and unplug them a lot. The quality seems fine. I like the diagram of the controller at the front that indicates charging status.

Both controllers were able to be charged using this at first until the first port completely stopped working a few days ago and wont charge either controller even when they disconnect from the PS4 because theyre completely drained

This accessory came out a bit on the cheaper side. Feels a little flimsy, like you should be extremely careful with it so it doesn’t break. Didn’t come with a brick for the wall outlet. Had to find one in my house. Other than that, does it’s job.

Very decent two controller dock. At first it’s kind of tough to get the remotes onto the base and connected but work pretty well and charges them fairly quickly. Don’t have any negative thoughts or comments on the base yet but will wait a week to see if it’s still working well and charging the remotes as it should.

All of my PlayStation controllers have eventually stopped charging via micro usb, was going to throw them out then bought this, charges through the bottom of the controller so my broken micro usb controllers are still good

I mainly bought this because the USB port would not generate a charge. I was happy to find out that this charging port charges from the bottom of the controller. Been using it for a couple of months now, I love it.

Helps with the contention for charging cables in the house on the weekends when the kids are around.Love the display for the charging status for each controller, and the easy fit - uses very little space as only the width of the controller is what is needed

I have a PS4 controller that for some reason, although it will hold a charge when plugged into the back of the controller, it will not charge.  This device allows me to charge that controller because the controller is charged through the front port of the controller as opposed to the back port, which on my controller appears to be defective.  Would purchase again.

These things are a life saver! Let me tell you I was so tired of running around all the time trying to find a charger cable. This was a game changer now my controllers are always charged. Best thing I’ve bought!

Only complaint is that it didn't come with a charging cord, so if you order one, make sure you have a compatible cord at home. Beyond that, it works great! 6 months after the purchase, it's still charging great!

The charger plugs into the PlayStation so it is only charging while the system is on. It also stopped working after having it for about 6 months. Not sure if that’s common with these but I would probably not but this product again.

I bought this dock for my PS4 controllers... works like a charm! The product feels a bit cheap (it only costs $15), but man does it work well!!! It charges the controllers quickly and the charges last a long time. Highly recommend if you have multiple controllers or just want to organize/ display them nicely.

Just a bit beyond the 30 day return window, suddenly the front charging port stopped working. Before that it was pretty awesome. Now it's just a bulky single-controller charger. Well, until the 2nd port fails.
If you want a charged controller when your ready to play. This is awesome and space saver. Just place your controller on the mini usb and let it charge away. This is haven for gamers
Works just as demonstrated, great for using your bottom ports, as its uncommon compared to the Micro usb on top that can go out over time. Stand shows colors accurately and charges efficiently.

I had 3 PS4 controllers that would not charge through a cord and plug to the outlet. I decided to try this out and sure enough, they all work. Playing Call of Duty every night I have to continually keep the controllers charged and this gets the job done.

I was a little skeptical at first because this product was so cheap, but I was very wrong! This charger is fantastic and was well worth the purchase. I simply place my controller on the charging unit at night and it is fully charged by the morning. It is very easy to use and a tremendous benefit for me!
Works properly even with silicone covers on controllers. Great addition for a casual gamer, I feel like a hardcore gamer would still need a charging wire during play but for me this is great.
My husband and children were pleased with the product! It arrived fast and in perfect condition. It was exactly as described and priced as expected! We definitely recommend this product.

I’m very satisfied with this product. Well worth the money and couldn’t be happier. It’s so great not having to keep up with a cord to charge my PS4 controller. Between everyone’s phone devices and the kids with their tablets I no longer need to worry about losing or someone else misplacing the charge cords anymore.

Great product. I wanted to eliminate cords and have a tidy appearance under the tv, and this solves that problem. It’s very lightweight so I’m unsure how long it will hold up, but it’s worked fine so far.

This has made my life much easier being able to charge my controllers both at once when I'm not playing so I can come back to two fully charged controllers after a long day. Definitely beats the one USB cable that comes with it. Great choice.

I bought this little guy because my regular cables wouldn't charge my controllers and it was a great purchase! It's small so you can store it wherever and it lights up while charging so you know it's working. My only complaint is that it can be tricky to correctly place the controller on the prongs and then you also need to make sure it's actually connected, but not a big deal in my opinion. Would totally buy again.
This PS4 controller charger is great, and so easy to use. I love that it has a light that illuminates to let you know the battery is charged. It doesn’t take up a lot of space either.

Want a nice way to get rid of wires and quickly charge your controllers? Tired of never knowing if your controllers were charged all the way? This device is simple in design, small in size, quick with charging, and effective in charging your controllers then lighting up with a green signal light when they hit 100% charged. Customer service is great too. I had a question about the product and they answered in no time at all. Happy I made the purchase.

Plugs right into the console, so no extra plug needed. Placement of the controllers into slots is easy. Durable and good quality. Charging light indicators are a good feature so it doesn’t leave you guessing which one is charged.

Stay away from this product, I don’t know what happen but after I started connecting my controllers to this thing they STOPED WORKING they are just acting up  and I just cannot use them. I believe was this thing because they where working perfectly fine but honestly as soon as i started using this charger they stopped working and they are acting up the same way.
Bought this for a friend a couple of months back and he still uses this every day! Still working great and no defects found so far! Definitely got my money's worth and would recommend!
It works well, charges fast, and everything.  My only gripe is sometimes it's difficult to get the controllers into the ports, and it should come with some better grip on the bottom.

Both of my PS4 controllers are able to charge at the same time. Super convenient when you want to use one and charge the other but don’t remember to plug the controller in to the charging cable. There’s a light that tells you when it’s fully charger. Very convenient

This charger doesn't work. It arrived, and the lights turn on when plugged in. Both lights on the charger show green even with no controllers connected. Putting a controller onto the charger does nothing, the lights on this charger stayed green even though the controller's battery was almost dead. It did not charge my controllers at all. Neither ports worked—terrible product and a waste of money. Feels cheap, even though I didn't expect much else. I did expect it to work, at least given the reviews. That is not the case, though.
Not bad but doesn't fully charge your controller. Great for casual gamers who only game for a few hours a day. Only charge controller up to 70% which I should had listen to the previous reviews.

Charges very well but both lights stay green even when one controller is not connected which makes you think it is not working.  It does show red only if you used the controller for a long enough time.  It shows green when it might be bringing it up to full charge with light use.  Low price and both slots for work well for recharging.

Did not work at all. Put both controllers on it and it charged neither. Tried it several more times for lengthy charges and nothing. Very disappointed. Green controller light wont even turn off even when a controller is not on it unless i unplug it.

This little thing is great! No more wires to connect controllers to PS4 to charge. And the kids actually remember to charge the controllers because it's "fun" to put on the device. And I dont have to hunt for the controller anymore when they are done!The only thing that would improve it is that it's too lightweight. Could use a weighted base or a rubberized base so it doesn't slide around.
Its a wonderful feeling being able to never ever have to plug in a usb cord over and over again to charge a usb device. Except for the usb cord you have to plug into the charger of course.
Love this dual charger.  Easy light up display is not only cool looking but easy to view charge status. Comes with usb charging cable. Great price for quality product. Satisfied customer.

This is super convenient and easy to use. I wish the playstation actually came with more than one charging wire, but since it doesn't we had to add this product. We have four controllers and it's so easy to keep them all charged with this and not worry about keeping track of wires.

One of the better PS4 controller chargers.I've had a few and this is my favorite, so easy to charge and don't have to fumble with a cord trying to plug it in. I like the light feature that shows red when charging battery then shows green when it's done charging

I use this to charge both my controllers, haven't ran into the "oh no my controller's dead" scenario yet. Easy to set up and use, just rest your controllers there when you're done and you'll never need a cord.

Great device,  only thing needed is an auto cutoff after charger is complete with reset function of toner when new controller is placed. Works like a dream.  Tight connection.  No more fiddling with USB cable port.

Just a little FYI you need to have a charging cord. Other than that it works well and the price was fair! I use it all the time and I love that it changes color to let me know when it's done charging!
The BEBONCOOL PS4 Controller Charger is great!! Charges my ps4 controllers in no time and plus it looks nice & sleek next to my Ps4 system. Very good price too. Glad I bought it.

I bought this charging system for my husband & we all love it. It's so convenient, we don't have to stand there and make sure we are plugging the cord in the correct way or anything. We just sit it down on there when we are not using it and it stays charged up. Another plus is we always no where the controllers are because even the kids like putting it back on this when they are done.

Wish I bought this sooner.  My controllers were always dead, the main culprit was that charging cords were always missing.  This keeps everything together and is an easy visual spot for my kids to remember to put the controllers.

I put my controllers on the charger and the lights were red for a small amount of time then turned green. The controllers did not charge at all. I have already thrown away the packaging; otherwise, I would have sent it back.

Only half of my charging ports ever worked.  The unit looks nice though on my entertainment center behind the TV.  But it is rather pointless to keep switching controllers just to get both fully charged before gaming.  I read it costs $9 to return a defective unit which seems outrageous so I'm putting up with the inconvenience.  Buyer beware!

Works great. Be sure to plug it either into your PlayStation directly or into an outlet or power strip that has a USB port. I initially tried to use an Apple charging cube but they don’t convert enough power.

My god this was a great purchase being able to charge to PS4 controllers and not having to depend on the light on the controller to let me know when it is finished has made this a worthwhile purchase.
