It states that Red light shows The PS4 controller is charging but it never worked. I have returned and ordered new one but still the Red light never shows. I think wrong described product. Frustrated to return again :-(

This product only comes with the dock and a very short USB charge cable. You either have to have a USB wall charger already or if you're like me I had to to purchase additional ones. Due to the extremely short cable I had to purchase a longer one so I could put the charger where I wanted it in my entertainment center. For me I would have been better off spending more money and purchasing a different one that came with an actual power adapter since with all the extra purchases I made I spent the same amount. Won't buy this brand again.

The product itself is great. Easy to use and the way the lights glow red or green depending on controller charge. However, it stopped working after just a few weeks! Dock will only show green lights and won't charge a controller or glow red when a dead controller is placed on it. Controller won't charge on the dock either, I know this because the charging light doesn't show up like it used to. If BEBONCOOL could send me another one under warranty that would be great. :(

For some reason, it's been really difficult to find a high quality charger for PS4 remotes. The one endorsed by Sony was cheap plastic and didn't work for very long, so I took a chance and have had a great experience using this one! It feels well made and it's much easier to plug in the remotes than with other chargers I've tried.

I couldn't handle the recharging cables that constantly fail so I decided to give this a try. Only started using it but it seems to work nicely and also gives me a spot to hold my controller when not in use.
Compact, easy to use, plugs into any USB port.  Neat and easy way to store and charge PS4 controllers.  No long, ugly wires.  Charges two controllers from one USB port.

Our last charger broke so we needed a new one in a hurry. This charger seems to be made better than our last one, fits easily in our media cabinet, and both of our controllers can be on the cradle at the same time. Nice buy.
I bought this because I needed to recover an old controller that had a damaged charging port, instead of purchasing a new controller, and it works awesome!, now I have two controllers again.

Set up to 2 controllers on the charger and they will be ready go soon... Charges fast enough. Contact can be a little challenging but this is a product of the "universal" type plug. Good recommended product here.

I like the controller charger, it's easy to use, the front of it does light up like in the Amazon picture shown. It will show you if the controller is charged or not. Delivered right on time. I didnt give the battery life of this a full 5 stars because I've only had it for A day. So far so good. I'd recommend!

Really convenient way to charge that doesn't look like you live like a slob. You can't just casually plug it in and generally need two hands get it to charge but that's a fault of Playstation, not the charger. Girlfriend stopped giving me grief about my controllers when I got this so yeah, 5 stars.

Works great and easy to use, but it’s not compatible with SCUF paddles unless they’re removed (I suppose this should have been obvious sooner, but is worth the trouble for controllers where the usual USB port has stopped working for charging).

Have has this for nearly a year.  Works perfectly fine - charges as advertised.  Looks nice.  The indicator lights are large.  Young kids were easily trained on use - no damage after constant docking.

For what I paid, it does its job. It plugs right into the controllers so no need for those small pieces that make them rechargeable. They get lost really easy. This one is so much better. Works fine so far!!
For some reason my controllers would not charge using the USB port. So I purchased this, and it works great! I plug it directly into my PS4. I love the way it looks, too!
So I like the charge and indicator function of this setup but it was a real pain at times to line up the controller with the pins to charge on the charger itself.

The ONLY downside is the short USB cable, and no charge box. But I have so many laying around it really didn't cause an issue. The indicator is true to the charge too. Probably going to be buying a few more when I get new controllers in!

Honestly this thing is a life saver. I've had countless controllers stop charging through the regular micro USB slot, and since this charges another way I don't have to worry about it. Not to mention it charges very quickly! Definitely worth it!

Work great when kiddo remembers to put the remotes on the charger. Easily to dock on the charger so they can charge. Love that there is a light that displays whether or not the remote is fully charged.

I love this. It's lightweight, it's the easiest thing in the world to use, it's stylish and sleek. Well worth the money, and works perfectly. I have two controllers constantly on it, so I never have a battery issue while gaming.
This charging dock gets the job done. It's relatively easy to put the controllers on the dock and it charges them well and within a reasonable length of time.

I purchased this for a friend for Christmas gift. It works great the only thing I wish is that it came with an AC adapter. I was able to find one easily on Amazon and it wasn't expensive.. it just would have been nice if I hadn't had to do that given the Holiday Rush.
I had a "busted" controller that one of my kids had damaged the top charging port. This resolved the problem immediately and I didn't have to buy a whole new controller!

I just opened up the charging dock and it did not come with the micro USB as advertised. I bought it in part because the micro USB charging port on my controllers had gone out, and in part because I dont have any micro USB cables anymore, so now I have to go out to a store to buy something that should have been included. Very frustrating, even if it's only a minor inconvenience. Its construction also feels light weight and cheap, but having just opened it I cant say much for its durability yet.
Awesome charger, worth buying,Worked as described. Now I never have controls that have battery low.

This is the perfect charging dock. It’s sleek and not bulky and fits really well on a desk or night stand. It’s easy to look at. It’s easy to use, and it charges really fast. It’s nice not having to constantly use a chord when I want to play but my controller isn’t charged. Must have!
Looks good on my TV stand.  No more cords to roll up or hide.My controllers are always charged and look neat and nice while doing so.

Killed my controller battery. Controller won’t stay charged and won’t charge with the PS4 cable anymore, will only “charge” on this dock but once taken off dock it will not work even with green, “fully-charged” light on and sitting for hours. My controller worked fine before this purchase. Thankfully, I didn’t put both of my controllers on this dock, only one to test. The test failed. Take my loss as your gain, don’t buy this product.

Bough this to try for my little guys ps4 controllers. They kept bending the USB cords and flat out broke a joystick. This charger is pretty much mistake proof. And the full charge indicator is on point. Great value had it for a few months and not a single problem. A must buy.
I hatd having turn on ps4 just to charge controllers seemed like huge waste of power.No i can plug this into my out and charge away...

I’d there’s a rubber skin on the controller, you it won’t sit in the cradle to properly charge.  Other than that, it’s a great product and I don’t have to worry about people yanking on the cord of the controller anymore. I

I been using this for a couple weeks now my first time trying something like this for my ps4 I must say the best investment I bought for gaming it helps so much because I have numerous controllers that die on me and now I can throw one of them on the charger and pick the other up and game it's real convenient if you thought about getting one don't hesitate buy this plus its affordable come on now.
this thing is a lifesavermy controllers stopped charging through the port and this little gadget charges them twice as fast and even makes for a good storing area

Originally wanted the PS4 dual charger but the delivery time was too long.  Took a chance with this and it Loads pretty easy and already is better and quicker at charging controller then plugging it in directly,

Controllers don't charge well. Even if you have it plugged in for hours and the dock says its charged they die really quick or not charged at all. Difficult to dock the controllers too. Would not recommend.

Small simple design, doesn't stick out like a sore thumb. It uses the bottom audio jack area of the controller, indicates as well with the controller symbols when controller is ready for use or charging, green indicating charged, red indicates still charging. Your controller will also light up in the front portion. Only for two PS4 controllers so keep that in mind. For the price it is well worth it. :) Would likely buy more if I had more controllers.

Works great. Had to switch to this charger because my boys would play their PS4 with the cord connected to the controller charging port on the back. The cords kept getting damaged and eventually damaged the ports on the controllers. This charger gives an alternative way to charge the controllers using the port ok the bottom of the controllers.

Seems to interact negatively with the PS4. When I plug this in it will continually spit out whatever disc is I the console, when this triggers your PS4 will go from whatever state it was in to the home screen, shutting down any applications that require the disc. Obviously if you're playing a game this is a major issue.

This charger was a gift for my fiancé! He loved it!! It works perfectly with his PS4 controllers. It makes it very conveninet to charge two controllers at the same time, and very quickly. The LED light indicates the charge status. It doesn't take that much space and it's easy to set up

Great product, came as expected and works great, really love how it does take up too much space on my TV stand. You will need a USB charging dongle to plug into the electrical outlet. It comes with a micro USB wire to USB to charge the dock. Would highly recommend because its a good budget value product.
I game with 2 consoles so have to grab different controllers often.The controllers are perfect fitting and very easy to mount and unmount with one hand quickly.

It never really worked. I could never charge 2 at the same time; only 1. Later it seemed that only the back port charged. Then it quit working. I went to return it but I’d missed that return window by two days. If you buy this and you have issues at all, then return ASAP.

This charger works great and makes use of the bottom charge port next to the headphone jack. Just slide the controllers in and it charges.  Also has overcharge protection that detects when the controllers are charged and turns charging off.  I plug it into the left USB port on the PS4 and it charges both controllers in rest mode.
good to charge products over a period of time. obviously cant still play and charge at same time like if its the wire cord, but works to charge well

This thing is awesome! I like that it doesn't have to be attached to the Playstation to actually charge. I keep this by my bed. It charges quick and I like the fact that you can keep the controllers on it without worrying about over charging. Good stuff.
Yes, yes, yesI love the looks of it just as advertised straight to the point on charging.
This charger works great. For some reason our USB charger wasn’t working and we needed a solution. This charger for the bill. It works great, was a great price and looks cool.
Fast charging PlayStation controller charger my boyfriend absolutely loves this it has a really sleek design that is high technology and is easy to use you just pop it on top and immediately charges.

Boys will be boys, plays with the games and leaves the controllers where they sit. This does the trick cause you can just grab and place them in the dock and walk away so it stays charged for the next gaming session. Keeps things neat and tidy.
Holds both controller's and chargers them pretty quickly actually.  Nice and small doesn't take up tons of space. Couldn't be happier with it.

This charger is just what I needed. My ps4 controllers struggle to charge from the USB ports but this one charges using the port next to the aux cord. I had a few controllers that I thought had battery issues but this charged them up right away! My controllers are always ready to go when I need them now. I wish I could play and charge but that's just asking for too much.

My kids go through a bunch of cords they always have them plugged in while playing and jerk the controller around and then the cord won't stay in and then they can't play and were always trying to plug in the cord while game is going and then they are all mad, this product just helps with all of that they just switch with the controller on the charger which is easy to plug in and take out and they are off to the races.
It don't take long to charge. The light is red when charging turns green when its charged ive had it for almost a year now and have had no problems with it
I've had all different types of chargers for my PS4 controllers. This one is very durable and charges fairly quickly. Its convenient and not a eye sore!

So happy this keeps the controllers in a designated spot and keeps them charged. Now when anyone needs to use it they know where to find the controller and it's charged. I wish the tv remotes could be this easy to maintain.
Awesome.  Works great. My kids suck with electronics and this charger holds up well against the wrath of the 6 and 10 yr old hurricanes!
After using this for 1 week my remotes do not work. Followed suggestions on YouTube and Google. Nothing worked. Now have to spend $170 for 2 remotes.
This works great and is so much nicer looking that having a cord coming out of the entertainment center. This fits in the entertainment center next to the PS4 and has worked great so far.

When it did work it worked awesome. But for some reason the back charger port wouldn't always charge. So we'd just charge one on it and use the cord to charge the other... Not a huge inconvenience but not what I was promised either.

I absolutely love this charger. I was tired of buying replacement wires for the kids because they were easily breaking. Only compliant is I wish it would charge them even when the PlayStation is off otherwise great product.

Picked this up because my old controller charger died. I actually prefer this one because it charges through the front instead of the micro-usb port on the back. Charging indicators on the front are pretty cool as well. Would definitely recommend.

Purchased this at the end of April. Stopped working by June. Sent a message to customer service over 2 weeks ago, and have yet gotten a reply.2 stars bc when it worked.. it was handy. Charging indicators say that all my dead controller are fully charged all the time, and it won't charge anything. Extremely disappointed!!
I git this girl my sons birthday so he can quit getting my chargers to charge his controller and he loved it! Now I get to keep my own charger in one place! A couple of his cousins want one now.

My boyfriend bought this and tells everyone about it! We're both gamers and between the two of us we have 7 controllers (most of them are his...) The dock charges fast and keeps us gaming! The one thing I remember him saying when we got it was how small it was. He was expecting something bigger. So that's a plus as well!

Its a little hard to get the cord to fit in the back to plug it up but the remotes fits very easy and it looks nice and it charges fast. I love the lights in the front that go from red to green when the remotes are charged to let u know they are ready to use.
I like it very much. Easy and fast charge for both PS4 remotes. It doesn’t mess with the charging port itself which has tendency to get lose and break.

Buy this if you want easy way to charge your controller. I wish I bought this from day one of buying my ps4. NO More needing to being hooked up to a USB cable to charge. Takes about hour to fully charge a controller. Red light indicates it's charging and green light on lcd shows its fully charged. Again if your looking for docking station this is the one you want over the products out there.
Super cute and slim.  I like the lights that let me know when something is charged. Charging two controllers and not having it overcharge is nice.
Worked great for a couple months but already having some troubles getting the rear charging portion to work. I like the idea and the lights but it is not working out for us
Ruined all 4 of my controllers. Shortly after connecting them to this device, they all started intermittently working. Now all have stopped.
Works great! I could be wrong but I feel like my controller battery lasts longer when charged on this dock then it does by just plugging it in to the cord itself.

Great deal & finally my husbands controllers won’t die mid game! 😂 -1 star because no matter if a controller is plugged in. It always lights up green not a biggie...but just a little annoying at night.

My boyfriend loves it. He has 3 controllers for his PlayStation and he always have at least one on the charger. He especially love the fact that it can plug into the wall so it can be next to him during game time and when one go out he can quickly grab another. I love the fact that it will let you know which one is fully charged.

I like this charging station way better than the micro USB one we had before.  That one plugged into the front of the controller.  This one feels much more secure. It is way easier for our kids to get them plugged in correctly. The mirco USB connectors were starting to get damaged from the other charging station.

Other than being a little complicated to get on for a 5 year old, I have been pleased with this purchase. For the price, these are great AND i love the visual on the front letting you know what remote and each of their battery levels. Helps kids switch them out before they completely die.

This controller charger is very effective.  The controllers sit in their cradle pretty easily and I like that the charger has an indicator that lets you know which controller is charged and which is still low on batteries.  Very economic use of space.  I would buy again.
My 10 year old son loves it. It's very easy to charge the controllers and we like the remote lights that change from red to green. Makes it very convenient.

Great value. Sometimes does not fully charge the controller if it’s not completely low, I’m guessing due to the overcharge protection.I dislike how the charging icons stay on all the time charging or not.
This is the best controller charger I’ve ever had. It’s great quality and works perfectly. It’s easy to use, and easy to understand! Also super easy to attach the controllers as well.
This does not work with PS4 controller. There is a small pin next to the charge connection. It does not allow the controller to connect. VERY Dissapointed
This device is a blessing if you have two or more PS4 controllers. Doesn’t over charge my controllers and I never have to worry about them having low battery anymore.

I love it. I dont keep my controllers on it all the time afraid it my overcharge or ruin my controller but I set it there for a few hours after gaming or in between games if I'm grabbing food or something. For the cost it's a great value.

This little charger is awesome!! The cord going into our Ps4 wasn’t reliably working anymore, and this has been an amazing solution. The controllers charge fast, and it tells you when they’re ready to go!
Works great. Got it for my kids so they'll stop losing the cords to charge their remotes and it helps them not to damage the charging port too.
I liked that it had a short cord, making it easy to place near the psfour - if you need longer cord, this might not work for you. fantastic and fast! lights up so you know which one is charging !

Me sirvio mucho para cargar mis controles, sobre todo uno que tenia la entrada de carga por cable dañada, temia que fuera la bateria en vez de la entrada asi que compre el producto y me sirvio, ahora el control me carga bien y funciona.
Item came extremely fast and is exactly as described. You can plug it into the USB Port on the PS4 or use a not included wall cube to plug into outlet. The cord does come with it.

My controllers weren't charging via the regular charging port, so I bought this and it's been very good! It doesn't take long at all to fully charge and it uses the port on the front, so damage to the one on the back is irrelevant.

Since the day after using the product I began experiencing problems with my controllers connecting to the PS4. They can power on but no longer sign in or control the console. After considering sending my console to Sony maintenance I come on here to find that this charger ruined several other customers controllers ability to sync. My return window closed last week but I demand refund/compensation!
Product is exactly what I ordered, so it's what I expected it to be. It has met all of my expectations. It charges my PS4 controllers while helping control clutter.

Welp, used once for one (newer) controller.  This charger made our controller so hot/overheated that the controller no longer functions.  So, not only did I waste money on this purchase....we now have to buy a new controller.  Not happy and I would NOT recommend this product.
It’s works... we have 4 controllers and we are able to charge them up it shows when they are done by lighting up green and red when they are charging..
Had a few controllers that stopped charging via the old usb adapter port. This actually hooks into the controller on the bottom two ports. Which is super handy. Compact and charges fairly quickly.

My husband and I now have two PS4's so I bought this charging station for us. I bought two. It is more aesthetically pleasing and saves space and just looks better. The only thing is I'm not 100% sure on battery life. They are still kind of new and we haven't played video games for a long period of time.
This killed 2 controllers. After charging them with this they no longer work in any way. Can't resest them or charge them. Completely killed them.
Me gusta porque permite recargar las baterías del control de Ps4 de forma rápida y segura sin dañarlo. Es para mi hijo que disfruta al máximo sus video juegos en casa.
At first both lights were green even tho 1 controller was for sure dead but that was on start up & after 20 minutes it seemed to “kick in” & station turned red & began charging & seems to work great
What I don’t like is that they need to be plugged up into the wall at all times in order to charge and work otherwise it will only charge when PlayStation is on

I like that I dont have to put my controllers 1 at a time on the original USB charger and when I have multiple controllers I use this and works very good and fast chargers for use and lasts a longtime until it has to be recharged again. I recommend  this item if you have alot or just 2 controllers. Badass item!
Got this when i bought a ps4 around April 2020. And now in August 2020 it has stoped working. Won't turn on or charge a controller
Nice compact option for storing and charging controllers. Controllers sit perfectly on top to charge. Light turns red to indicate controller is charging.
I love how easy it is to connect every time! you don’t have to struggle finding how to plug it in. Such a great price!!
This is the best PS4 controller chargers I own. I have purchased many charging docks for PS4 and XBOX ONE Ofer the years and this is by far the best of them all.

Perfect for my children, they break the normal charging wires in minutes. They put the contoller on the platform, it turns red and when green its done. Even my 4 year old can work this charger. Game changer right here!
Sent to my grandson for Christmas and he was really happy, lives in Ireland and could not find one all were sold out .

Works great and looks great. I had a controler with a worn plug and wouldnt always charge so this was a great way go charge it without buying a new controler. Also hid the cords making the entertainment center even nicer
Got it to keep my controllers organized and it had the added benefit of changing them. Put a 3m command strip on the bottom to keep it from moving and it works great!

This thing is great! No more tripping on cords and the controllers are always charged. Should have gotten this years ago!

Product arrived the lights worked perfect as the description shows after some time both controllers were fully charged and functioning perfectly. Easy to use very well made exactly as seller described would definitely rebuy and recommend very well put together

Love this PS4 controller charger.  It's small and lightweight and doesn't take up much space.  It's easy to attach the controllers to the charging ports - just lay the controller on the backstop and slide it down onto the micro-usb port.  The big bright icons on the front of the charger make it easy to see from any distance if the controller is still charging (red) or fully charged (green).  Does exactly what it's supposed to do.

When I play games on my PlayStation, my cat thinks the cord is his toy. This let's me play cord free and always keeps the controller I'm not using charged. It also charges by the speaker jack so it has less wear on the USB plug. Highly recommend.

When I plugged it in to charge with the PS4, the light that is suppose to turn red doesnt turn red to indicate that the remotes are charging. It acts as if it isn't charging but my remote light blinks orange like it is charging. So confused. The light is suppose 2 turn red so why is it green because my remotes aren't fully charged. The electricity light isn't on neither. Just two fully lit up green remotes. Extremely disappointed man. Instead of charging it with the PS4 USB I plugged the USB into the head of a Samsung charger and plugged it in the outlet which is connected to the charging station. When the station is plugged in the outlet and not the PS4 it charges both remotes how it is suppose 2 and the light turns red with the electricity picture on top but I know for a fact it's not suppose 2 be in the wall outlet. I'm assuming the output from the wall outlet is enough for the dock to now charge my two remotes but I might be messing it up and without even knowing.

This is a simple charger.  It has a USB charging cord, so you'll need a power brick to charge it (it doesn't come with one).  2 PS4 controllers fit nicely together on it.  It uses the bottom ports of the controller which I've never used before for anything.  I've been charging them on a stand that uses the port on the top, so it's kind of nicked up after all this time.  So I'm happy to use the lower ports now.  The unit itself has a nice small footprint and doesn't take up much space.  It's a good little organizer for your 2 controllers.  I don't get the large lights up front - They look neat but they are pretty big and are too bright to be on in my room at night.  The lights look like the controllers, which is neat but also unnecessary.  It lights green when charged or when it's just sitting there on it's own, and they turn red when charging a controller.  It will charge the controller even when they are on and in use.So far it's an upgrade from my previous charger.  I'll just stick some black tape over those large lights!!!

Worked right out the box, this comes with a USB cord you connect to the charging station that connects to your PS4. From there you just place 2 controllers on the charging slots and you're all set! Really easy set up and works perfectly. The indicator lights let you know when the controller is fully charged, changing from red light to a green light. Very satisfied with this purchase.

My son was so excited about this, especially since I’m pretty dumb when it comes to gaming. This was apparently the perfect surprise gift. He loves that the charging lights change color when the controller is charged and it helps keep him from losing the controllers. Delivery was quick and as expected.

My daughter can run a controller battery down in no time so we are constantly waiting for one controller to charge. Whats worse is when we can't find the cord to charge the darn things! I was so excited to get this charging dock for out controllers. It chargers fairly quickly and we don't have to worry with making sure we know where the cord is. We just set it on the charging dock and it does its thing. So now we always have an easy time charging our controllers while also enjoying our game play.

I've been using this guy for months. It's nice to be able to throw the controllers on here instead of pulling out a USB cable every other day. I also appreciate that it can charge two at a time with a single USB. This ensures you've always got a dualshock waiting in the wings and keeps your other USB port open to charge your headset. Charges just as fast as the USB and the green light lets you know when it's done. For the price you really can't beat this.

We have a number of controllers, and only so many charging methods -- when controllers are not properly placed in chargers, controllers do not charge. We had resorted to individual charging cords on a USB strip which is a cord nightmare and a pain.This charger makes it EASY to assure the controller is seated properly, with a visual indication that charging is occurring (red) or charging is complete (green).

This charger does its job perfectly and I like that you see charge indicators for both controllers on the front of the unit.While this is a great charger, I could not give it a 5 on Ease of Use because I view the USB depency as a weakness. You'll need to plug it in to your PS4 or a spare phone charger with a removable USB cord or discard this one. It should have a traditional wall plug and it'd be fantastic.

My 8 yr old is notorious for ruining controllers by not understanding how to easily and correctly plug them in. He ruins them because of messing up the charging ports. But this was the perfect solution! It’s small, easy to use, he simply lays it in the device and the light shows red. This way he knows for sure it’s charging and turns green when done. It charges them quickly also. They only take about 2 hours to charge. It’s the perfect solution for kids!

Received item last night . Son was super excited to try right out of box item wouldn’t work only showed green lights not red for charging! Will send this set back and hope the new ones work when they arrive.Update received a second one and this one worked for less then a day ! Wouldn’t recommend

It is pretty easy to use and obvious how to connect the controllers for charging.  I only ding it because it didn't include a USB charger (just the cable - which wasn't especially long).  The charger itself doesn't feel awfully sturdy so we'll see how it holds up over time but it worked for the two controllers I have.It's compact and easy to use.

While this charger feels very light (and therefore, as another recent review noted, pretty flimsy), it definitely does the job. Wish it came with a wall socket adaptor rather than just the USB cord , because I don't like having cords hanging out of the front of my PS4, but at the current price (under $15) it's a good buy. I also like that the stations light up when a remote is charging (red) and finished charging (green).

We have one of these for each of our PS4s and they both work great.  It nice to be able to throw the controller onto the charger when you're done playing and know that it will be fully charged when you get back.This was easy to set up and is easy and convenient to use.  It seems durable.  I would definitely recommend if you are looking for a quick and easy PS4 controller charging station.

The Beboncool PS4 DualShock controller dual charging dock, made in China, comes with the charging dock, USB to micro USB cable, and documentation.  A charge indicator shows two images of a controller, each indicating if the controller is actively charging when red or is charged beyond 70% when green.  Limiting charging to below 70% charge is an attempt to preserve battery life.  Placing the controllers in the charging dock is simple.I would prefer an outlet adapter be included.  I currently have the charger plugged into one of the PS4’s limited USM ports.  I would rather the controllers be on the side table next to where I’m sitting than in the TV stand.

Shows red when charging and green when done, easier to determine than when using a single cable.  Nice little iconic pictures show the colors.  Charges faster than standard USB cable, perfect for those two player competitions.  You get two equally charged units done quickly when needed for next game dual.  Great price for nice compact charging device, that goes great with the game console.  Has features to prevent overcharge as well, so a good unit.  This is important to have that feature, I had some power packs for one of my hand held systems, and they basically overcharged and started smoking destroying the charging electronics.  I had to have them rebuilt at a local battery specialist place.  Recommended for PS4 owners who use multiple controllers.

This is exactly what I needed! With my PS3 I used to have to leave my station on with the controller plugged in via USB to charge so it’s ready for next time, but I would have to remember to come back and shut it off. That also overrode my HDMI switch with my setup so I can’t do anything else on the TV meanwhile.Now with my PS4 and this dock, I can have the dock plugged into a USB jack independent of the PS4 and charging every time after use with no cables stretched across the room or needing to keep the PS4 on just to charge the controller.

I was getting tired of constantly having to plug in my controllers one at a time into my PS4 and then setting it into rest mode. I decided to get this charger because I could easily charge both controllers quickly and at the same time. It's pretty much a plug-in and start charging basic setup. Now I just plug the charger into the walls and seat both of my controllers onto the dock. It has a color indicator that shows red when charging and green when fully charged. It's able to charge them completely in around 2 hours or so. This is the best purchase because I no longer have to fiddle with making sure the PS4 is charging my controllers correctly. I just wish I had purchased this many years ago to save me tons of hassle.

Its nice.  A small little dock for two controllers, plugged it in and with no controllers on it both lights came on green.  Not discouraged I plugged in both controllers hoping to see them turn red.  Didnt happen.  Powered on one controller in the dock, battery indicator was not blinking indicating charing.  Unplugged usb from base bad plugged into controller its self low and behold....it charges....try the dock again and nothing.  Why would a company continue to make something THEY KNOW DOES NOT WORK?  Extremely disappointed I wasted my young nephews (9) xmas gift to me on this.  He was very proud to give me the 10 dollar amazon gift card he worked himself doing chores for his neighbors.

Great product!  This device plugs right in to my PS4 and although getting both controllers to fit in together was challenging at first, I soon got the hang of it.  The best part is probably the lights on the front that not only let you know when the controller is fully charged, it also provides a status on just how charged up it is.  Another nice feature that is probably overlooked by some, is the rubber grips on the bottom that keep it in place and not getting pulled off on to the floor all the time.Nice addition for a gamer that is always having to worry about having a charged controller available.

I was excited for this item. My brother has never had issues with controllers being low power and he never had to have a 10ft or longer cable to game when low on power. He has had something that does the same and so I wanted the benefit of dual controller charging as well.I was disappointed right away with the sheer size of this item. I decided that it was ok because it needed to be big enough to hold 2 controllers and other than the charging components and the smart chip inside it shouldn't be heavy. Then came time to use it and I notice right away the green lights don't go away.

This product is perfect for what it’s purpose is the only thing that would make it better is to make it for four controllers instead of two and that’s not a complaint just an observation well worth the money use every day great purchase

I've had other charge stations in the past and this one is by far the best. It's easy to place the controllers on it and kids have no problem using it as well. I'll be replacing my own with one of these as the first was a gift.

This Gem is amazing! The docking station is very compact so doesn't really take up much space and is very easy to use! came with very easy to follow instructions so there is no confusion in setting up and it is a bargain for the price. in any gamer house this is a must buy!!!

This charger dock is amazing. I bought it at least 3 months ago and it’s still running and charges the controllers fast. It’s convenient so you don’t have to waste USB space if you mount it into the wall like I did and so I have space for my USB headset and storage hard-drive. Highly recommended

I can't tell if the material is just very cheap or if it's meant to be light weight but regardless, its a good charger. It's nice to be able to keep my chargers displayed and organized besides my PS4, it adds to the look of my game center. It looks a bit more neutral than the heat sci-fi look the photo portrays. I actually like it better. Definitely a good addition to a classy gamer's lifestyle.

If you like the front side of your entertainment unit cable-free, then this is a very cool product. It's functional, and looks cool. I don't know about whether this damages / overcharges the controllers or not, but haven't experienced anything negative in over 4-5 months of usage.

The Beboncool PS4 Controller Charger is pretty handy. It charges quickly. It is not designed to be bulky, but instead is sleek and streamlined. You can charge two controllers at once. It charges via USB. If the indicator light is green, it is fully charged. If the indicator light is red, it is charging. Overall, this is an inexpensive controller that does just what it needs to.

My younger kids are constantly messing up and breaking their usb cords. This is a great solution. The ports are very durable and are much easier to use than the cables. Definitely saves you having to buy new controllers or cables. Been using months and haven’t had to replace one.

This unit comes with a USB charger so that you can power the charging station dock. You will need one of the USB charging blocks that plug into an electric outlet. If you have any smartphones, you probably have one or a dozen already. If not, they are available on Amazon. You can charge two PS4 controllers at one time. When charged, the light turns green.

Pretty convenient dock. It works well, and it keeps everything neat without having cables all over the place. It does seem like it was on the cheap side, as far as the construction. Just cheap plastic in the construction. But for the price (under $14) it absolutely works well. We'll see how long this one lasts, but so far we like it.

This is my second dual-charger for my PS4 and I like this one better than the other, simply because it has a low profile and can fit into tighter places, like smaller shelves and cubbies.  The feedback (charging indicator) also appears quicker than with my other one, so I'm not sitting there guessing if I got a good connection or not.

This is a great little charger, with nice LED indicators. It's easy to attach and remove the controllers. I'm only docking it a star because it doesn't include a wall plug -- you have to either provide your own, or plug this into a USB jack. (It does include a USB cable.)

It charges my controllers, sometimes, but very slowly and inaccurately. Packaging was in good shape (albeit minimalistic) and the charger looked good out of the box. Shows the green light for controllers being fully charged, then they die after five minutes of use (normal charging gives them a few hours of use). Mine is probably just defective, but given the price, quality and the cheap "wholesale" appearance of the plain white box it came in I wouldn't be surprised if defects are common. Proceed with caution if you aren't interested in the effort of replacing one of these; I wish I would've just spent a little more on a more reliable brand.

These charge pretty well. Make sure your devices are securely in there to charge. Despite the small hiccup of the battery indicator not working for me, it does charge efficiently.

This dual charger holds our PS4 controllers solidly and displays them in a way that invites me to play God of War and Spider-Man. It also really helps tidy up the look of our entertainment center. 5 stars for high quality form and function for $13???!!

There is not much you can say about something that does so little, outside of that it does exactly what it is supposed to do. It charges PS4 controllers, and it does it well. There isn't much to it outside of a simple plastic body, a few LEDs on the front and a micro USB cable. You plug it into the PS4 or any wall adapter, drop your controllers into it, and presto, your controllers are charging.The only thing we could pick at is the fact that it plugs into the controllers via micro-USB as you slide the controller into it. This forces you to help guide it in and apply some pressure to make full contact. It isn't as easy as some of the Xbox One or 360 dock options that simply drop right in and make contact. However, this is because those solutions replace the batteries with their own rechargeable battery solution that charges via metal contacts.  You can't do that with the PS4 controllers since their batteries are built-in. So this dock (and others) are forced to use the micro-USB port, thus there isn't any getting around this. In the end, we couldn't hold it against the dock, thus it didn't affect the score.
Total junk, stopped charging after two weeks and the status lights only ever show green

Gone are the days of waiting hours for my controller to charge. Gone are the days of having to plug it into the PlayStation while I play. This gem charges quicker than any charger for any device I have ever seen. I love that I can spend all day playing with one of the kids and then charge both at the same time. When it first came I had a really hard time getting it lined up correctly, but I eventually got the hang of it - I can be taught - and now it locks in place without a problem. The only bummer I have encountered is that the two controllers with rubber covers cannot fit. Thank goodness the kids use those and sit in the chair right next to it so it can plug into the ps4, while I use the others, lol.

Got tired of forgetting to plug in my controllers, and trying to find a USB cable. So I ordered this. And wow! I didn’t even know you could charge a PS4 controller with the port on the bottom. But this thing does it, and quickly! Now I just put them on the base when I’m done, and grab the other controller the next time I play.It also allows me to charge both controllers simultaneously while keeping my other USB port free for my wireless headset!

This uses the bottom holes in your controller to charge them. My kids are rough on controllers and have wore the USB ports out on otherwise good controllers. Much easier for them to plug the controllers into this one. I know there are other chargers out there that use dongles. While the dongle chargers are good for my controllers, the kids keep losing them. So went with this instead, which was great.

It comes with a 6" USB A to Micro cable.  My issue is it will not charge from the PS4 console if the unit is powered off.  But will, of course, charge when powered on and or if the console is in rest mode.  As for the rest of the unit, it cradles my PS4 controllers nicely and the front red/green charging/charged indicators are nice.  If the lack of a power brick isn't an issue, I'd recommend it.

This is my 3rd PlayStation charger and by far my favorite! We previously had one where you had to hook little plugs into the controllers for them to rest of the charger station. Can you guess how long it took to lose one? Yeah.. as a mother, I don’t have time to keep track of charging pieces. This worked perfectly. We just rest the controllers on the charger and it will either light red or green. Flawless. It does not need to be connected to the PlayStation in anyway, just your ordinary outlet.

Update: 06/17/2020 this product had been awesome! It has held up great and my husband uses it without any issues to charge his controllers. I’m surprised how well it’s holding up considering I have too aggressive kids who bang stuff around!! Would still 100 percent recommend!Just got this in the mail today and right away my husband was extremely happy with it! Plugged in easily and keeps it clean without all the cords! As you can see he has his controls plugged in and charging!

Plugs into same port used to charge a single controller on PS4.  I like it because not only does it charge one controller while I'm using the other, when I'm not playing, the dock stores the controllers so they're not just laying on the stand or table next to my chair.  LED lights on the front indicates red when charging and green when fully charged.

I bought this for my granddaughter so she could get her wireless controller charged quickly and because it wouldn't charge with the other port, guessing the other port of her controller was bad but  plugged this in, it charged very quickly, within a couple hours, maybe even one, was surprised, great quality and it feels sort of heavy like it's not made of cheap cheesy parts....sturdy and very happy with it so far.

I have a funky controller. Battery doesn’t last long without being charged on the regular. As in always. This device saved my life. Yes, Jesus Christ, Buddha, Aphrodite and the rest of the gang had a party at my place and agreed that this is the key to saving one’s life.I do wish the cord was longer, but not too big of a hassle. Saved me a trip to buy a new controller.

I hated the finicky nature of the micro USB cables for the PS4 controllers and I thought they looked messy. Enter this dock! The perfect solution to my issues. It looks great sitting next to the console and the controllers are super easy to plug in. The light indicators are a helpful feature and it has non-slip dots on the bottom to keep it firmly in place. I'm happy to have a sleeker looking solution for charging and it removes the worry of accidentally damaging the connection with the wonky cords. Highly recommend!

How can this possibly have so many ratings?  ...let alone positive ones?  No A/C adapter; cheesy connections, thin plastic, overly impressive descriptions and photos.  Buyers beware unless they drop the price to $1.99 in which case it might be worth the risk.If I didn't rip open the overly sealed packaging (likely a ploy to discourage returns), I would send it back immediately.  OK, you get my $12, but Amazon should be ashamed.

I've heard of these third party items for charging controllers, but never bought one until now. The standard single cord that comes with the default controller when you buy a PS4 can be sometimes flimsy when charging because it needs to literally be plugged into the console to charge while you play. If you have multiple controllers you need to plug one to a cord while another is on standby.This is surprisingly efficient as you can charge both controllers at the same time and be notified about the charging status by the icon located on the front of the charging station. This is something I should have bought years ago, and is essentially a must for anyone who uses multiple controllers on the PS4 they own on a daily basis. The charge actually lasts about a day if you use it, and it takes about two to four hours for a recharge through the USB port when connected to a power source.
UPDATE:Stopped working just shortly after return window closed.

The charger works great, I love it!  I wanted something that was low profile to fit in the center console that is built into my couch and I came across this charger.  My only complaint is that the micro-usb port for power seems to not work unless the cable coming in has some pressure pushing down.  I attached this with velcro inside my couch and was able to fix the power cable as well so it is not an issue anymore, if this were sitting out on a tv stand however it might by a problem.  I bought a seperate 2.1A wall outlet charger to hook this to, and it will charge a controller up very quickly.

Its works good. I got it for my nephew so that he can keep his controllers out of the way neatly while charging and storing them, which is wonderful, but sometimes you have to wiggle the controllers around in order to get them to charge and I'm a little afraid that it might break. But other than that they are great.

The green/red light just blink on and off because there isn't enough juice to power two controllers.  So what I did was plug in just one controller to charge.  HOWEVER, after I check on the unit a couple hours later, I noticed there was no green light indicating that the controller was fully charged.  The entire unit went dead.  This is the first day!

As many others have gone through, the primary charging ports on my controllers have loosened from the circuit board and because of that only charge if you lay it and the cable down carefully.I now own 4 controllers all with the same problem, I opened one up and fixed it (maybe temporarily) but the time and effort to save $60 for a new controller is questionable.

I bought this for the kids Playstation hoping to keep the controllers from laying all over the couch, and keep the controllers from tying up the phone charger cords all the time.  This charger base does that, and the kids actually use it, so it must  be convenient!Works well charges controllers and organizes them. Just place the controller on the charger port and press it into place, light changes from green to red to indicate charging.  The only thing I noticed that was somewhat confusing and I suppose uses more power than needed.  The indicator lights for the charging ports are green even if no controller is mounted, if a controller is charging the indicator light is red, fully charged controller is green and empty space green.  It would make more sense if no indicator light is on when controllers aren't mounted.

I really like this charging pod.  I was admittedly skeptical at first, but I have been using it daily for about 2 weeks now with no issues.  it is actually rather aesthetically appealing, so I can leave it out on top of a tv stand next to the console and it looks rather nice sitting there.  the LCD display is very attractive as well, extremely easy to read, and VERY bright. - Can see it perfectly from across the room, EVEN WITH the lights on.  I would absolutely recommend this for ANY PlayStation gamer.  In fact, I also bout the genuine PlayStation dock at the same time just in case I didn't like this one, or had problems with it falling over...  I never even opened the PS charging pod, and sent it back because I was so satisfied with this one.  I actually think this one looks nicer anyway.  And zero issues with it falling over.  Built nicely.

Otherwise, this product functions great.  The only problem is that the lights on the front are reversed.  When you plug in a dead controller in the back, the front light will light red, and vice versa.  This is confusing enough to be annoying, but not reason enough to replace it.  The controllers get charged up nicely, and it plugs into the cord I was using to charge just one of these.  It doesn't come with an AC adapter but I don't think it's necessary.

I desired a DS4 dual charging dock with charging LEDs and for both controllers to dock upright (because docking the controllers upside down is just awkward and looks strange). This dock powers through a single USB connection and can be plugged into one of the USB ports on the PS4. The dock will charge the controllers even when the PS4 is turned off (stand by mode).The only issue I have with the dock at the moment (which is not a really an issue but more of a gripe) is that the LEDs are reversed. So the top LED is for the bottom controller and the bottom LED is for the top controller. This makes it somewhat confusing and will take some time to get used to, especially if you are charging two controllers at once.

Worthless to me. I got this because I am sick of the constant error messages I get with my extra long cables."headset disconnected, etc." There is no fix for this, so I figured this product would help. Only problem is, its power source is the PS4, so when I turn the system off with my depleted controller, I can't charge it with this product. I am aware that I can get a wall adapter and other fixes.  But it's just easier now to use the extra long cable and then unplug it when I want to play,  so I don't get the annoying messages on the PS4. Also the first docking port didn't even recognize or charge the controller.
This charger killed both my ps4 controllers 2 of them no longer worked husband bought new parts to fix it cannot be fixed because they were totally fried so lost money on all of it. Total lost

The low profile of this product is very useful for me as I store the remotes on a shelf that is not too high.  This fits perfectly.  Unfortunately, the charging in slot 1 is a bit inconsistent.  Slot 2 has worked well right out of the box.  I've had to wiggle the remote to get slot 1 to engage and charge.  I've tried both remotes that I own and both behave the same so it has to be a contact issue with slot 1.  Other than that, I really like this product for ease of use and storage convenience.

I purchased this as a gift for my daughter that received an XBox for Christmas.  It plugs in and works right out of the box.  The USB cable could have been a little longer but it works perfectly fine.  It's a little difficult to determine what degree of charged each device is visually (like a percentage or flashing light or something), but this isn't a deal-breaker.Also, the tilt at which the chargers are inserted into the base could have been re-designed a bit.  You have to try two or three times to have it set properly.  I would purchase again if needed.

I have used several different PS4 controller chargers over the last few years. This one is above and beyond the best I have tried! The controllers plug directly into it via the aux/audio ports on the bottom, rather than having a USB dongle. They charge VERY quickly as well! The unit itself is sleek looking with a lovely screen showing if a controller is charged, charging, or nearly finished. The only downside I've had is that sometimes they can be tricky to remove with one hand, but that is down to the relative newness of mine and how firmly I put the controllers on the cradle. 9.8/10!

Why I got it:I needed a standalone stand to charge my PS4 controllers instead of using a USB and having the controllers just on top of tables or whatever. I only have two controllers, so this was perfect.

We've gone through I don't know how many usb cords, and I had a cooling fan/charge ports for the PS4 but it required one of the PS4 ports to plug into.  With my daughters USB wireless headphones and the external HD this became useless on that cooling fan charge station.  The cable for this unit was too short to use a separate wall plug.  This one has a long cable which I use an old phone charger USB outlet plug to plug into.  The only downside I have is you have to make sure you seat the controller well for it to charge.  Part of that, though, may be an issue with the controller itself as one of the controllers I had does not seem to charge using any method now.  A new controller charges fine as long as you firmly place it in the charging port.

Solid product, so easy to use. No more messing with extension batteries that fall out on the ground every time or plugging in cables.Also, I didn't know this plugs in on the inside of the controller. Didn't know controllers have two spots for charging. I put my controllers on it, and never have to worry about running out, it's always charged. Easy to use, easy to put in, snugly fits and easy to take out. Glad I ignored all the negative reviews on this. Will recommend.

I read some bad reviews about this product and then some that praised it. We took a chance because I liked the fact that they charge from the rear of the controller instead of the front, much easier and more stable! I have had none of the problems at all described by others. I've had the charger for about 4 months now and they work perfectly just as described and charge the controllers very fast. I highly recommend this product.

I got so tired of my usb charger for my controller. I would trip over them occasionally and it was really annoying having to plug them in while I played games because I couldn’t change positions without pulling the cord.So I bought one for myself and the other for my man! We love them! They charge our controllers pretty quickly and they look nice and sleek.

First of all this charger doesn't do anything more than any other charger will do, be it from your console or a USB adapter from what I have observed. This charger requires that you plug it into a 5v source because no adapter is included with it. This charger will keep you from damaging the USB port of your controller and will allow you to charge your controller via the headset input on the opposite side even if you are unable to charge it through the USB port. I love it, it works very well.

Excellent charger for the controllers as it is much simpler to lay them on this charger than to try to plug in a micro USB cable. No complaints, charges quickly and easily. Construction is a little lackluster but not enough to remove a star. It is sturdy enough for what it was designed for.

I'm happy I made this purchase it is super slim so doesn't take up much space and is really convenient to keeping the controllers charged. I do feel like they don't stay charged but that may or may not have anything to do with the charging station I really don't know for sure.

We bought 2 of these for Christmas and they have seen their fair share of use between 2 teenagers and 2 younger boys.  They have held up well. Easy to use and understand. Shows a red remote for charging, green for full or empty slot.
We've had it for a couple of months now and it works really well!  It's small and compact, charges quickly, and I"m honestly surprised at the quality for the price that we paid.
Charges my controllers, looks cool, and no slop when set in the assembly. The little controller notification turned green when it was fuller charged and red when it wasn't.

I gotta say this product is don't it's job. I haven't had it long. But it's been working since day one. Chargers ready to go. Never having to wait. You can hook it up to the PS4 or anything else and you're good to go. I'm impressed so far.
Awesome charging station. I am glad it charges at the back of the controller, the front port gets weak and shoddy after a time and eventually fails completely.

I love this product, I like the fact that it charges pretty quick. I always have my playstation and sleep mode and my controllers on this charger all the time so it's always game time. So I definitely recommend this product and game on!!!

It works as promised. The only issue is the need to plug the controller into the charger as opposed to simply placing the controller on the charger, but I expect that's mostly due to the PS4 controller's design.

Got this for my controllers because the charging cords were in the way and frayed, and for the week I have had it; it’s been wonderful. My controllers charge super fast and hold the charge for a long time. Amazing product at a good price!

The charger works, it keeps the controllers charged.But, there must be an unwritten threshold for the battery to have discharged to make the front light be red instead of green. The only time I've seen the red light was when the controller had a 1/3 charge according to the PS4

This charger is excellent! It's small, easy to use, and fully charges my controllers without trouble. I especially live that it tells me when a controller is done charging even though the controller already does it on its own. Way better tonuse than a regular usb cable. Would recommend it to anyone.

Charges in a fair amount of time. Takes up minimal counter space. Averages about an hour to fully charge a dead controller. Only drawback is that the port is sometimes hard to rest in the cradle. But works great.

Thought my PS4 controller went bad because it wouldn’t charge anymore. Apparently it’s a common flaw where the micro USB port goes bad and won’t charge. This charges through the bottom ports which saved my controller. Great product and charges 2 controllers fast through 1 USB port.
Doesn’t take up too much space. Both controllers can sit on it without falling off. There is even a picture of each controller that shows up and lets you see how charged each remote is.

Plugged in and used right away. I have 2 controllers and one is always charged and ready so never any down time. This charges on the mic side of the charger so even a controller with a worn usb port would still charge if that was your only problem. Great product.

I really like this. It charges fast and uses the mic port to charge. You need your own wall outlet plug, but that wasn’t a problem for me. I like how there are indicators that change from red to orange then green when fully charged. It’s lightweight and doesn’t take up a lot of space.
Bought this for my hubby for Christmas. We love it. Plan to order another one for my daughter. It’s easy to set up and easy to charge. Love seeing the color so we don’t over change it. Great buy.

I bought this for my husband for his birthday. He loves it. I hated always having the long charging cord laying across our living room so I searched for a cordless charging option and came across this charging station. It’s perfect. My husband can use one controller while the second is sitting on the charger and switch them when the controller dies.
Works we, has a good visual for children to see if charger is workingBest part is that the cradle allows the controllers to be put in by children quickly and usually without error.
Very useful!!! It helps organize the controllers. The controllers do not fall on the floor anymore. I would buy as a gift or again! If you have two controllers- buy this!

I have this plugged in to the ps4, so it only charges the controller while the console is on, but that is not the sellers fault, just how I have it set up. Either way, it charges pretty quickly and it is an easy way to keep me from leaving my controller all over the place. I like it, it works, and it is cheap.
The charging stations I buy - no matter who makes them - seem to only be able to charge one controller at a time. This one is no different. I plug two dead controllers in and one lights up charging.

For me, if both controllers are placed to charge, only one of the red lights turns green, which indicates only 1 is charging, I don’t know if that’s only mine that does that, but that’s what mine does. Wish it could knock out 2 at a time, but still satisfied with the product, good quality, light weight, and compact.

Absolutely has been a lifesaver, we no longer have more than one dead controller in the house at any given moment. when the ps4 is in rest mode, the controllers will still charge, so every day we wake up to controllers fully charged

One thing I like is that it lights up red if it’s still charging and green if it’s done - right on the display in the front, so you can see it from across the room. It is very easy to tell which one is which also. Good investment.

Does the job, but only 75% of it. The station stops charging once the controller reaches 75% so it limits the life after being undocked. I actually stopped using it a week ago and plug in one at a time using the cord to charge them up fully.

Great charger, controller mounts well, charges fast. Only complaint would be when the controller is near charged the dock light doesnt know wether to be red or green so it kinda flickers on and off between red and green.

Love these chargers - so much easier putting the controllers in the mic slot for charging. Indicators are great. The one I use the most had the back slot stop working, I still use it daily and front works fine. My second one has had no issues so far.

Look carefully on this item because if they posted the fact that all official PS4 Dual Shock controllers do NOT charge via both ports, I missed it.Funny thing is, i bought one of these a year ago with the same results. Duh.........

Charges ps4 controllers to full and keeps them fully charged until I use them.  Looks nice.  Best feature is that the lights tell yoi when the controller is fullly charged so you can cycle your contollers on it to get them all charged quickly.  I would totally recommend this to anyone that likes a clean desk look by organizing desks space to have less clutter.
The back charger stopped working within 4 months. Tested it with several controllers and none would charge on that spot. Only on the front half.

This thing works great. I really like that thr controllers use the USB-C connection on the bottom. It's a secure connection and dont think there's much risk with damaging the connection port like there can be with the micro USB port on top. The controllers slide into position very easily. The indicator lights are a nice touch too.

Love this. Just set the remotes on the port (using the headphone port) and it charges them. The indicator turns green when the remote is charged. If you’re looking for something that will remain on after you’ve turned off your PS4, this is not it. It only charges when the system is on— which is fair IMO. Anyways, I highly recommend this product!

Very happy with this purchase.  The cradle is attractive, holds the controller firmly and always charges appropriately for me.  I like the light-up indicator on the front to let you know if it's actively charging the controller (red), or has a full charge (green).

My sons have obliterated all of our charging cords. I did not know this charger existed. The top USB port doesn't even work well on our remotes so I thought I needed to replace them. Nope, just from the cords being ripped in and out. This works very well.

This was a great quick solution for my child who always forgets to plug his controllers in, it also is great because you don't have to worry about your kid trying to shove a charger into the port the wrong way ruining a $70 controller! Defiantly worth the money.

This is great to keep your controllers organized and charged. I was always leaving controllers on side tables, or the tv cabinet, and would find them low on charge. This means they are always in one place and ready to use when I need them.

This does not come with a wall charger. So you need to either buy an outlet for it or hook it up to the PS4. I had bought this to be on my end table near the couch vs near the system, so it didnt work for me.

I bought my children 4 name brand Sony PS4 controllers for $60 each and 2 of these chargers. The chargers did not shut off as they claim and burned up the batteries inside the controllers. I am out $240 in controllers and whatever these chargers cost at the time of my purchase.

Bought this as others I have used in the past are more difficult to use. I like the way the controller sits on the charger, and it seems to charge a new controller fairly quickly. Great price for a good working item.

Works as described, except the image is misleading.  I was hoping to get a unit without a big ugly logo on the front, as pictured.  The version I received has a big ugly logo on the front, akin to certain less expensive models.
I love that this charges my controller from the front where the headphones plug in. It looks nice it is well made, chargers quickly, doesn't get in the way. I would buy this again in a heart beat.

I have tried several different options to charge my son's (2) PS4 controllers and nothing compares to this prodcut.  My 7 year old has NO problems resting his controllers in the charging positions on this prodcut.  It works great and does not feel like it was made cheaply. I would highly recommend this prodcut!

Love this!  My charge cords would work on other gadgets, but not my PS4 controllers.  I was thinking the controllers could no longer be charged. Before I went out and bought new controllers, I spent MUCH less on this charging dock, and it’s fantastic - I wish I would have found it earlier!!!  I highly recommend this to anyone who wants any easy and reliable way to recharge your controllers.

I used to have a cable charger. Because I want to buy another controller, I bought this charging dock. It fits just right. It is faster ,too. That only takes about half an hour to get the  power full. The design is good, simple and slim. When the charging is done, the light will turn into green.The only thing I concerned are how many times the connector can be used and is it too easy to break.

I thought this would suck because it was so cheap, but decided to give it a try because I was tired of dog's tails ripping the cords off the PS4. Love this! Bought it about 6 months ago and still works great.

Simple and works! I have it plugged into a usb power strip so that they can charge while gaming system isn't on. Kids always plug them in now when they're done playing. No more low battery controllers! Can't be beat for the price.
Got this as part of Christmas present for my boyfriend and he loves it! Easy to use and quick charging! Very happy with this purchase highly recommend.

Works great, looks nice and one thing I really like about this product is that, the led lights on the front lets you know the Battery level of remote. It plugs in to the bottom of your controller and easy to put remotes on. Looks nice and very light weight
Simple, effective, small, and works great. Sucks PS4 controllers have like 6 hr battery life or less. This thing helps a lot.
charges better than the wire that comes with ps4 and other chargers I have had that charge from the top port rather than the bottom.
I wanted to like this but apparently it does not work. Plugged it into my ps4 and the 2nd charging dock constantly shows red even though the controller is fully charged.
Charges great. Looks good with the PS4. Only draw back is the cord is extremely short so it’s now sitting on the floor in my daughters room
Has a pin next to the charging port so the controllers line up easily and I really like the display telling me when they're finished charging. Seems to be much more solid than the charger I replaced.
Its compact and it works. Fitting is snug which is probably good but it's not a quick slam ot kn if that's what you want
I don’t like using the cable to charge my controllers. This product displays my controllers and acts like a hub after playing while charging it too!

If you take one of your charging cubes from your cell phone, and plug this in independently from the PS4, your controllers will always have full charge when you’re ready to play. Make sure your cube is 5V, and you’re all set
So much better than plugging my cable in all the time and having it dangle off my TV stand while my cat attacks it. Controllers fit perfectly and charge fully.
It works the majority of the time, had to return the first one because it completely stopped working within a week. The second one has lasted several months so far
My 12-year-old wanted to be able to always have charged controllers – it works well and doesn’t take up space.
Product was exactly as described. Charging stand for gaming controllers is easy to operate and very user friendly.
Husband loves it, can charge both instead one at a time and they tell you when they are charge by the light
Great! Works great. Love that there is a display with controller lights showing when its finished charging.

I had no idea that you could charge ps4 controllers through the bottom port, but damn if it doesn't do a good job. No more bent connections from having to lay the controller on all weird, it just works and looks pretty cool while using it. Very satisfied.
I bought an extra controller because the console only comes with one. My older daughter loved ❤️ the red🕹color. Now they each have their own! Awesome price too.
This works great! Charges on the inside part of the controller, which I didn’t know charges as well as the USB. Looks neat on my side table.
Buen producto, pequeño, práctico, permite ver la carga de los controles y cargarlos de manera simultanea.
Works great!! I noticed the controllers charged in less than two hours! I like how it also doesn't take up much space.
Not easy to set the controllers in the charger; it is very cheap & lightweight so it slides around.
We absolutely love this charger. Its small easy to use and works if charging port on top has stopped working.
Great product for the price! Easy to setup, & easy to charge controllers. I really like the red/green light to show the charging level.Shipping was also super quick!
I would buy this again in a heart beat. It's so nice to not have wires all over the place.It so easy to use and we always know where our controllers are now.
You have no idea how much this has saved me on controller's. Not enough stars ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐to use for this one.
This little charger works great, easy to use and quickly and efficiently charges your controllers.
Perfect! We use this all the time now and it makes it so easy to make sure the controllers are always charged! Easy to use and charges fairly quickly! Very good price!
Great to have for keeping my controllers charged. It's convenient to just set the controllers on the dock when you're done.
I love it! Keeps my controllers fully charged.  I don't have to use the micro usb port to charge them anymore.
Great design and convientent to use as a charger when the controllers are not in use. It also looks much nicer than corded charges hanging from the PS4.
It works as needing. Charges two ps4 controllers at once. Comes with very long cord that we have plugged into the playstation straight into the charger.

It's not easy to get the controllers plugged in. Only one of the two chargers work. Overall its cheaply made and not very good. The price should have told me that. I wouldn't reccomend it and will be replacing it with a different one
Make sure you don't user a fast charger with this.  I'm using a 1.5 amp abs it works great
Keeps your controllers charged. I like it. Nicely done
I got this for my boyfriend for Christmas he Loves it!
Charges great but indicator lights don't work as specified on the instructions
I had this for less than a week and it already stopped working. Thought it was my plug in so I tried a few others. Won’t charge. Not sure if I got a bad product or what, but this thing doesn’t work!
Works well for charging, like the charge indicators.
Only one of the two charging ports work on this device.
My nephews love it. It’s working great for their PS
Easiest charger to use!! Much better than the other kind that use the phone type charging port.
Hooks right up and works great. Very sleek looking. I love how it lights up green when charge is complete.
Not only does this work like a dream but it's also conditioned everyone in the house to put the controllers away.
Love this thing a looks cool and does a fantastic job charging and the controller easily mounts in it
I've only had it for about 6 weeks now, but it's worked great every day so far.  Very convenient.
At first I thought it charged from the port that faces the tv/monitor during play. I was incorrect; this charger uses the port that face you during play. Amazing charger and inexpensive.
So far so good after continuously charging for a few months and no complaints!!

Needed something easy & convenient to charge my PS4 Controllers. Found this charger at Amazon & decided to give i5 a try. Works very well & received it as described. Received the charger sooner than expected. Would buy from this seller again.
I really like that 2 controllers fit on the charger and you can see the status of the charge. Would be nice if the bases could connect so that only one wire is needed. No issues so far
This charger has done what it was supposed to do. There's nothing much else to say about it.
I plug in my ps4 system or plug it in and it didn't charged my brand new ps4 controller so I'm communicating with tech support.
I love just plugging them in and not worrying about cables not working.
Very short cord for plugging in and you need a usb block if using an outlet. Item is heavy duty, controllers fit in easily and charge well. I would recommend
Works great. Perfect fit for the controllers.
Works great! My kids actually charge remotes now!
This works great and can’t be beat for the price.
Best purchase ever for this gaming household.
Works perfectly.  Exactly what I needed to keep my controllers charged.

Great product. My controllers would no longer charge via USB port. Needed something that would charge by the port on the bottom of the controller. This did just that. Fast charging and a wonderful product. Price is excellent for what you are getting.
nothing to dislike set it up and put controllers on it seems to work just fine.
Looks good and definitely easier to charge than the other version that charges controllers upside down
Works like it should. It lights up when the controllers are being charged and shows green when it is charged.
Great for older controllers where the original charge ports no longer work.
Easliy plugs into PS4, and charges both of my controllers no problem.
Works great. Charges quickly. Looks really nice and tidy in the living room.
Less space. Less cords. Less clutter. My boys like it, so I'm happy!😁👍
Very happy with this purchase. I bought others and just the USB cord didnt last on them. This is holding strong and im content.
Love these.  Looks much better than the cords hanging out front
