Works as expected. Only down side is that it doesn't come with a box to charge only cord. Purchased a charger box separately.
Gave me a place to put my controllers that is nice and neat, and made it so I don’t have to have USB cords sticking out of the front of my PS4 all the time.
The front dock works. Back one doesn't 😭Edit: Company reached out and sent a new one. Works fine!
Definitely worth the price. No more buying cables
so easy to use it and love to use it. save my time too.
It was a great buy! My son loves it and it really does  charge fast nice and sleek
My kids love it. They said it works great and it charges fast.
This product has saved me a tremendous amount on cables.  Use one until it dies and the second one is ready to go.
I love it it does what it’s supposed to
Best dual charger I have owned. Fast charge and super easy to use and understand. :)
Works perfectly and is a great deal!
It works recommend buying it!💁🏾‍♀️
Only wish it accommodated more than one style PS4 controller.
I was having trouble getting my controllers to fully charge. This solved my problem. I use a 2 amp USB charger with this.
So far this works exactly as we anticipated.  I would buy it again.
My sons play station controller charger broke needed a new one these one is perfect size and works great arrived on time.
No more controls hanging around!
Charger works great. Easy to use
If you want to charge two controllers at once this is the way to go
Fits controllers well, I like the indicators in the front and the usb posted. Good charger for sure.

Great product and great seller.
Works great so far! Better than getting new cords each month.
Sits on my table by my TV.  Just drop the controllers on when I'm done.  Keeps em charged.  Looks good.  No cables.  Buy it.
No more having one controller die, while the other one is charging. Also, no swapping cables back and forth. Great investment for the money.
It does what it said it would do!

I've had a PS4 for years and have always been annoyed at having to charge the controllers separately. It was always a struggle to find a way to charge them, find the cable, and keep things organized. This charger entered my life and is an absolute must-buy for the PS4.It charges two controllers by plugging into the front of them. I never knew there were charging ports there. It'll show a green controller when it's fully charged, or red if it's not. You can keep it plugged in (doesn't include an AC adapter) all the time, making it easy to charge your controllers any time.

I needed a charger, and of course, one for two controllers makes sense. The charging is definitely good, and while I haven't timed the charging, I've never grabbed a controller that wasn't fully charged, and it seems to charge to full capacity by the time I check again.Even without the fact that it's a charger, it's actually a great way to store controllers. I think that game controllers often just get dropped wherever, and so having a docking station for them is pretty nice for keeping things organized. It's a factor that I hadn't considered at all in getting this. It's an unobtrusive docking station, and it fits in neatly with everything else on our entertainment center. You can't go wrong with it.

I hate micro-USB ports. It’s the main thing that keeps me away from Android phones. We have five PS4 controllers, and I bought two of those because I thought the batteries had gone, but really it was the micro USB cords. That was an expensive lesson.Well this charger plugs into THE OTHER SIDE of the controller, which seems like a much more robust connection.  Also, there is a little green controller-shaped LED that lights up when the controller is charged (it’s red when charging).  I plugged this into one of the USB ports that the micro USB cords were formerly plugged into.

This simple charging unit is designed perfectly not to take up a lot of space, and charge two PS4 controllers effectively. Lights on the front of the unit are clear and instantly give the current status of the charge. Green for fully charged, and red for charging.  The unit is relavively small, but that works well for tight spaces.The unit is powered by USB and the only issue is that the PS4 base needs to be on for the USB port to provide power. That being said, any USB power port from any source will activate the charging capability of the dock.

We have another dual-charge dock for PS4 controllers but THAT ONE requires using the controller to push down a large connector which I guess was designed to make sure you have the controller aligned - but it does not work. This design is much better with a connector out where you can see it and a pretty intuitive way to mount the controllers on it. The indicator lights (outline of controller in red for charging, green for charged) looks nice. The unit itself is very light and I am not sure how well it will hold up to long term use, but so far we're very happy with it.

We have two XBOX 360s, XBone (awful), every generation of Nintendo everything, and PS1, 2, & 4... So dangling cables\controllers are a problem. We got something similar for the 360 in the living room a while back, and when I saw a PS4 equivalent, I had to give it a go (there were PERPETUALLY controllers lying about with USB cables plugged into the front of the consoles).Does what you expect, while being about as compact as you could expect. Vast improvement, I'm extremely happy with it and I recommend everyone with a PS4 switch over to one of these.

The charger works very well. The controllers are held snugly in the docks and it charges them quickly. The indicators seem to be accurate, and clear. It doesn't take up much space and as of yet, seems to work perfectly. The charger also seems to be of relatively good quality although the plastic didn't feel the most sturdy. Overall a good charger.

This charger stands out in my mind due to the fact that it doesn't stand out. Unlike many controller chargers I've used in the past this one goes out of its way to appear subdued and not stand out too much in your cabinet. The charge status lights are great, work well and make sure that you always know when your chargers are ready to go. Base has some rubber feet on the bottom that do a great job of keeping it where it's at.

Controllers fit in perfectly and it helps me keep things organized on my entertainment center.  Just a USB to micro USB connection and had no issues hooking up.  I have taught my kids to keep them there so now I always have a fully charged controller.
This is a fake. The dock pins do not fit a ps4. False advertisement. Do not buy!

Nachdem ich mit meiner Erstbestellung einer Lade- Stauraumlösung für die PS4-Move&DS Controller ziemlich schlechte Erfahrungen machen durfte (ein DS-Controller sowie ein Move Controller tot) kann ich über diese Station nur positives berichten.Als Netzteil kommt ein iPhone Netzteil (Das schmale, kleine) zum Einsatz, und beide Controller werden sofort erkannt und geladen. Die erwähnenswerte, durchdachte Kleinigkeit ist die "Führung" um die Controller mit dem Ladeanschluss zu verbinden, hier wird ganz simpel der Kopfhörerausgang verwendet. Somit kommt es auch bei Grobmotorikern wie ich es bin zu keinen "Problemen" beim ein- und ausstecken.

Ho acquistato questa basetta di ricarica per i controller della PS4 per evitare di occupare le porte USB della PS4. Esteticamente è molto bella, accanto alla PS4 fa la sua bella figura. Per quanto riguarda la qualità è ben fatta, robusta ed elegante. Sulla base ha dei piedini antiscivolo molti utili e, sulla parte frontale, due icone a forma di joypad le quali si illuminano per mostrare lo stato di carica, di rosso durante la ricarica e di verde a ricarica completa. Sono necessarie circa 3 ore per ricaricare entrambi i JoyPad.La basetta va collegata tramite cavo microUSB in dotazione, ad una porta USB della console o ad un caricatore da parete.
Ich habe zwei PS4-Controller für meinen Rechner. Die Controller verbinde ich über einen PS4-Bluetooth Adapter von Sony.Die Verpackung ist sehr passgenau mit möglichst geringen freien Räumen.

Endlich hab ich es mal geschafft, mir eine Ladestation zu besorgen!Nach unzähligen Kabeln die ich verschludert habe und leeren Controllern nach dem ein neues Spiel mal rauskam, hab ich jetzt einen zentralen Ort für meine Pads 😊

Sentire tuo figlio esclamare "noooo! aspetta aspetta che devo attaccare il filo perché il joypad è scarico!" nel bel mezzo di una partita di Fortnite è davvero fastidioso, così ho deciso di fare a entrambi questo regalo. Mentre gioca il secondo joypad è in carica, così impiega pochi secondi per recuperare la partita e mettere sotto carica l'altro.Il prezzo è davvero ottimo per i vantaggi che comporta. Esattamente come il cavo normale collegato alla ps4, anche in questo caso non carica se la consolle è spenta.

Sta funzionando bene. È piccolo e non ingombrante. Pensavo che i led verdi a forma di joypad si illuminassero  di verde o arancio solo nel momento in cui inserivo i joypad, invece se non sono inseriti i joypad sono sempre accesi in  verdi. Non ho ancora provato a vedere se il colore cambia quando un joypad è scarico e nel momento in cui lo inserisco nella basetta cambia colore se è scarico i carico.Per ora consiglio l'acquisto.

Ho comprato questo prodotto perchè ero ESASPERATA di trovare i controller della ps4 di mio figlio sparsi per tutta casa. Più di una volta è successo di calpestarli o smarrirli per poi trovarli nei posti più impensabili.Con questo caricatore una volta utilizzati i controller vengono riposti nella loro posizione creando così ordine e anche un bell'effetto ottico perchè hub ha sul fronte uno schermino che dice quale caricatore è caraico e quale sta caricando.

Ottimo prodotto con un buon rapporto qualità-prezzo. Gli unici problemi da segnalare sono la mancanza dell'adattatore, ma qualsiasi caricabatterie da telefono va benissimo (specialmente se da 2A), e la difficoltà nell'inserire i joypad nella carica. Si deve infatti armeggiare un pochino prima di trovare la giusta posizione.Per il resto fa il suo lavoro e carica i joypad abbastanza velcoemente. Se non sbaglio poi dovrebbe avere un circuito che fermi la carica una volta raggiunto il massimo, per cui si possono lasciare i joypad attaccati anche al 100% di batteria.

Best product to charge both ps4 controllers together, it is exactly how it looks, works exactly what is says, worth every penny, buy it from the seller HUIMEOW-India, their product is genuine, they deserve 5 out of 5 rating.

Ho comprato questo caricatore per i miei gamepad e devo dire che ne sono molto soddisfatto,data l'ottima comodità e facilità di utilizzo e soprattutto l'ottima velocità nel ricaricare.Hanno due led,(che si illuminano in verde se sono carichi,rosso se scarichi)che permettono di scoprire quando i gamepad sono carichi.Si attaccano normalmente con un cavetto del telefono e come detto prima,in poco tempo si ricaricano e siete pronti per giocare senza più dover utilizzare il cavo per caricarlo mentre si gioca.Che altro aggiungere?Nulla,se volete la comodità di non avere fili mentre si gioca e volete anche un design molto ben curato,allora questo caricatore fa per voi.

Ottimo carica-joystick, prima che lo comprassi, capitava una marea di volte che accendessi la play per trovare poi il joystick scarico ed essere quindi costretto a giocare collegato via cavo, oppure delle volte passavo un ora a cercare dove lo avevo lasciato.Per questo sono contentissimo di aver comprato questo caricatore, è bello da vedere, i joystick si agganciano e sganciano con una facilità disarmante, la superficie di appoggio è solida e antiscivolo.

Meine Jungs haben ständig ihre neuen Kabel kaputt bekommen und nun mußte eine andere Lösung her.Mit dieser Lösung des ausladens bin ich mehr als zufrieden, da endlich der Kabelsalat beim spielen aufhört und ich keine Angst mehr haben muß das uns die Playsi runter fällt.

The second charging port doesn't auto cut and.overcharges the controllerThe build is good and there is no problem in the first changring port butthe second charging port is bad and effect the controller battery life. I orderedtwo of them there were same problems in the both.

Endlich ein bisschen Ordnung bei der PS4 und beide Controller anständig in einer Ladestation aufgebaut dachte ich.Das das Ergebnis nur eingeschränkt meinen Erwartungen entspricht, war schon durch die Bauweise der PS4 klar, da das erforderliche USB Kabel zwangsläufig immer vorne an der Konsole angeschlossen werden muss. Die angeschlossene Ladestation mit beiden Controllern würde also zwangsläufig nie richtig gut neben der PS4 aussehen. Aber dafür kann der Hersteller ja nichts...

Die Ladestation funktioniert wie sie soll. Bis zu zwei Controller haben Platz und werden gleichzeitig geladen. Ob der Controller voll ist, wird vorne mit zwei leuchtenden Symbolen angezeigt.Der einzige Kritikpunkt ist, dass die beleuchteten Symbole manchmal auf rot(leer) springen und danach wieder zurück auf gelb bis grün (halb bis fast voll). Dies passiert aber meist nur einmal nach dem Anschließen der Controller. Danach lädt alles, wie es soll.

Essenziale nella sua struttura, ben fatto e dall'aspetto gradevole. Malgrado sia made in Cina, la sua plasticosità è di buona fattura. I led gli conferiscono un pregevole look. Veloce nella ricarica ed il prezzo, per la qualità del prodotto la ritengo ottima. Se ci fossero 6 stelle, le avrei assegnate senza tentennamenti. Il servizio Amazon, neanche a dirlo, ineccepibile come sempre. Lunga vita al RE! Lunga vita ad Amazon!

Ich hatte es langsam satt das meine Controller immer wieder leer waren und auch kein festen Ort hatten wo ich diese hinlegen sollte. Damit habe ich beide Probleme gelöst und sieht auch noch gut aus. Das laden an sich geht schnell und wird damit angezeigt das die LED am Controller selbst leuchtete und am auflade Gerät rot leuchtet. Ich höre kein spulen fiepen und es ist solide gebaut. Würde ich mir wieder kaufen, hoffe aber es hält lange 😁

In terms of design, this is a great accessory for the Playstation 4. I very often look for my controller before I play and usually it is not fully loaded.  I hope this has come to an end.  The charging unit charges 2 controllers at the same time and shows this very nicely in the front area (red ischarging, green is full of charging).  The controllers can be easily locked onto the charging unit.  I can only recommend.
Sehr schnelle Lieferung.Sehr schnelles aufladen beider Controller gleichzeitig.

Schönes Ladegerät für 2 PS4 Controller, das aufstecken der Controller funktioniert sehr gut. Das Einzige was mich ein wenig stört ist das die grünen Status Leuchten IMMER leuchten (mit und ohne aufgestecktem Controller) egal ob ein oder zwei Controller... es leuchten IMMER beide Status Leuchten. Natürlich wird die Leuchte bei dem zu ladenden Controller rot aber warum geht die Leuchte nicht aus wenn ich den Controller entferne!? Das ist aber auch schon mein einziger Kritikpunkt... Produkt funktioniert gut.

montato da pochi giorni funziona benissimo, finalmente gli aggeggi di mio figlio non sono più buttati qua e la per la casa e fa anche un'ottima figura. I led risultano verde e rosso se un telecomando è carico l'altro no, quindi i circuiti sono indipendenti. ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo. Soddisfatto

Den Controller stets mit dem Kabel zu laden ging mir auf die Nerven. Die dockingstation lässt sich leicht in betrieb nehmen und hat ein schlichtes Design. Durch leichtes einrasten lässt sich der Controller laden. Auf der Anzeige ist ersichtlich, sobald der Controller voll geladen ist.Weitere positive Aspekte

ottimo articolo per caricare 2 controller ps4ottima fattura per il prezzo pagato, buon desing es ottimo l aggancio sulla parte anteriore del controller che ha un pallino in plastica che fa da guida per centrare l aggancio del controller.

Caricatore veramente ottimo!!! La sua forma lo rende veramente comodo da utilizzare perché non occupa molto spazio, anzi, fa recuperare spazio avendo due controller messi per verticale! Molto carino e stiloso. Perfettamente funzionante e molto utile. Materiali molto buoni. Rapporto qualità prezzo eccezionale!! Spedizioni velocissime con Amazon!

Das Gerät funktioniert. Die Controller lassen sich allerdings recht schwer auf das Ladegerät setzen. Man muss das Ladegerät daher stets festhalten wenn man den Controller "draufsetzt". Irgendwie unpraktisch. Zudem hat das Ladegerät einen leichten Wackelkontakt. Hin und wieder muss ich den Controller 2-3 mal auf das Ladegerät setzen damit es funktioniert. Daher, keine Kaufempfehlung.

Die BEBONCOOL PS4 Controller Ladestation für 2 PS4-Controller kam originalverpackt an. Sie ist einfach zu montieren und macht, was sie soll: die Controller-Laden und niedrige Akku-Füllstände anzeigen bzw. anzeigen, wenn sie voll geladen sind. Positiv ist, dass es zum Laden der Controller keiner weiteren Kabel bedarf und daher der Ladebereich jetzt ordentlicher aussieht. Ich würde die Ladestation wieder kaufen.

Wer kennt es nicht. Man nimmt das Gamepad in die Hand, startet die Playse und wenige Minuten später hängt der Controller bereits am USB Kabel zum laden. Mich hat dieser Umstand dazu gebracht diese Ladestationen zu kaufen. Nun können die Controller in Ruhe aufladen und sich für die nächste Session vorbereiten. Optisch sieht es tatsächlich auch ordentlicher aus, wenn die Controller in der Station stehen, statt irgendwo im Wohnzimmer herum zu liegen.

Comodissimo per ricaricare i pad della PS4. Le luci indicano la carica del pad, rosso per "in carica" e verde per "carica completa". Non so se lasciare i pad carichi attaccati possa rovinarne il ciclo vitale ma forse una volta vedre la luce è meglio staccarli dalla base.Indispensabile se si ha più di un pad.

Questo ricarica controller è una trovata geniale!Invece che attaccare un cavo che va dalla PS4 al dualshock e ricaricare i 2 che ho uno alla volta (poiché ho un HDD esterno), questo caricatore mi è molto comodo e mantiene più ordine del cavo che parte dalla console.

Die Ladestation ist direkt an unserer PS4 Pro angeschlossen; die PS4 ist so eingestellt, dass sie den USB-Port noch 3 Stunden im Ruhemodus mit Strom versorgt. In dieser Zeit sind die beiden Controller wieder geladen. Das Ladegerät sieht stylisch und wertig aus, passt gut zur PS4 Pro. Die Controller werden über den Kontakt vorne geladen und sitzen stramm auf dem Ladegerät. Man muss beim Abziehen das Ladegerät also leicht festhalten. Ist aber kein Problem. Über die Langlebigkeit vom Gerät und den Kontakten kann ich noch nichts sagen. Kontrollersymbol auf dem Ladegerät leuchtet grün, wenn der Controller aufgeladen ist oder kein Kontroller steckt, während des Ladevorgangs leuchtet es rot.

Funktioniert und macht was es soll, die PS4 muss allerdings auf Standby sein damit die ladestation Strom bekommt, oder man schließt es seperat an einer USB Ladestation an.Die anzeige von den Kontrollern verwirrt nur... mal Grün mal Rot... obwohl keiner was gemacht hat. daher ein Stern abzug.

Ich finde es ist eine gute Alternative, wenn der Controller leer wird muss man sonst immer diesen fummeligen kleinen Mini Usb Anschluss an den Controller machen und ihn vor oder neben die PS legen. So hingen hat man das Kabel direkt angeschlossen und legt die Controller einfach drauf. Die LED zeigen an ob die Ladung voll ist oder nicht. Ich bin zufrieden und würde es wieder kaufen

Mal lädt es, mal nicht. Dann leuchtet keine Anzeige mehr, dann leichtet sie orange. Da ist irgendwas kaputt und funktioniert nicht. Man sollte doch die Originale von der Playstation kaufen. Das ist totaler billiger Schrott!

Ein sehr schönes und vor allem sinnvolles Gerät für die Aufbewahrung und zum laden der PS4 Controller. Passen perfekt hinein, geht nicht schwer und Laden geht auch. Die einzigen 2 kleinen Negativ Punkte sind zum einen ein etwas kurzes Kabel (für mich aber durchaus angemessen ich spreche nur für die allgemeinheit) und das Ladeprinzip funktioniert nicht immer sofort (bei mir behoben durch einfaches hinauszugehen und wieder hereinstecken des controllers.

War leider defekt. Konnte nur einen Kontroller laden. Beim aufsetzen des zweiten sprang der andere direkt auf angeblich voll geladen um. Leider auch sehr billig verarbeitet. Wurde sofort zurück geschickt.

Caricatore perfetto. Appena arrivato messo subito sotto carica. Veloce non ingombrante o due led segnalano la ricarica. I miei figli sono contenti acquisto consigliato. Ne avevo una a pedana ma si è rotto subito questo sembra più resistente.

Un must. Carica i due pad in modo molto comodo. Si collega via usb alla play o come ho fatto io alla TV così anche a play spenta i pad si caricano. I LED passano da rossi a verdi quando è carico il pad.

Avevo bisogno di una stazione di ricarica per avere sempre un controller carico durante le sessioni più lunghe. Il design è accattivante e soprattutto gli indicatori di ricarica mostrano quando è completata la carica. Per il prezzo un vero affare!
Die Ladestation wirkt sehr hochwertig und stabil. Die Kontroller sind sehr schnell wieder aufgeladen und man erkennt ganz leicht ob einer noch geladen wird oder ob der Akku schon wieder voll ist.

Da mein Sohn ständig momentan mit der PS beschäftigt ist, müssen die Controller ständig aufgeladen beleiben. Die Ladestation ist kompakt und sitzt gut neben der PS ohne viel Platz zu nehmen. Die Aufladung geht gefüllt sehr schnell bzw. nicht bemerkbar. Klare Empfehlung
Ich habe die Station gekauft um etwas Ordnung zu schaffen und beide Controller einfach laden zu können.Die erste Station kam leider defekt hier an, aber ich habe sofort ein Ersatzgerät erhalten.
Die Ladestation läd nur wenn die Playstation an oder im Ruhemodus ist. Es liegt ein USB Kabel bei aber kein Adapter für die Steckdose. Deshalb von mir nur 2 Sterne.
Fantastico, comodo, compatto e esteticamente bello. Attenzione, non ha il caricabatterie ma questo non è un problema funzionando con qualunque attacco USB. Consigliatissimo
Comodo, attenzione ad agganciare bene i controller altrimenti non caricano nulla. Per fortuna ci sono gli indicarori luminosi (verde/rosso) che indicano se è carico o meno

Ottimo prodotto. Fa egregiamente il suo dovere evitando di dover diventare matti a trovare sempre un posto dove caricare i joypad. Comodo, veloce quanto basta, finisci di usare il tuo joypad e lo rimetti sulla base di ricarica certo che la prossima volta sarà carico a dovere. Altra nota, la base non ricarica il joypad se questo non è abbastanza scarico.

Die Controller müssen genauso fest auf die Station gesteckt werden, wie wenn man ein normales Kabel verwendet. Das bedeutet, man muss die Station jedes Mal hoch nehmen. Dadurch entsteht kein Mehrwert und der Gebrauch eines Kabels ist praktischer.

Funktioniert Wunderbar und im Zimmer siehts gleich aufgeräumter aus...außerdem klaut mein Sohn jetzt nicht mehr ständig meine Ladekabel...hat durch das ständige knicken beim zocken schon zwei kaputt gekriegt...jetzt hersch wieder "ladeharmonie" Zuhause

Designe und Funktion super. Kann man gut neben die PS4 stellen oder woanders. Muss nun nicht immer die Controller über die PS laden. Wäre sehr schon gewesen, wenn es gleich ein entsprechendes Ladegerät dazu gegeben hätte. Was anfangs etwas verwirrend ist, das auch die Station bzw. der Port grün leuchtet wenn kein Controller drine steckt. So kann es passieren, wenn man den vermutlich vollen Controller nimmt und er leer ist. Hier sollte man schauen ob man da noch was verbessern kann.
Bei mir leuchtet mir eine Controller Anzeige da weis ich garnicht ob Flyer Controller geladen ist oder nicht.

Ich muss gestehen, ich war am Anfang etwas skeptisch... es war auch kleiner als erwartet.. ABER es sieht einfach super aus so wie es ist und es qfunktioniert einwandfrei. Ich kanns nur weiter empfehlen!
Perfekt für meine 2 controller!Stabilität ist top,kann man eigentlich nichts falsch machen!

Davvero un ottimo prodotto , sono rimasto stupito dai tempi di ricarica che sono brevissimi, consiglio vivamente questo prodotto  che sostituisce decisamente tutti quei inutili fili che molte volte si rompono , ottimo design che non rovina affatto il design della mia stanza!
Il carica controller funziona perfettamente, è poco ingombrante e anche carino da vedere.
Naja, die Ladestation ist billig gemacht aus dünnem Kunststoff und die Haptik ist auch nicht besonders.Der Micro USB Anschluss ist schief und steht zu weit im Gehäuse.
Caricatore veloce e con i led di ricarica visibili per sapere quando tutto e pronto per usarli .

Ottimo prodotto bello da vedere in materiale resistente , molto comodo per ricaricare 2 controller ps4 e rapido nel ricaricare , con i led che ti indica quando é carico il controller  , fa il suo dovere è non a nulla da invidiare a quello originale sony.Consigliato👍
Per adesso funziona molto bene sono soddisfatta e lo consiglio. Consegna super veloce come sempre
Die Ladestation funktioniert einwandfrei. Ist für normale PS4-Controller geeignet. Die Controller sind schnell voll und alles ist aufgeräumt an einem Ort
Ottimo x ricaricare due controller contemporaneamente. Poco ingombrante. Lo consiglio

Sieht gut aus und erfüllt seinen Zweck. Könnte etwas schneller laden aber gut. Ladekabel ist mit dabei und viel Platz nimmt die Station auch nicht weg.Was mich etwas irritiert hat sind die ladelämpchen. Die sind vertauscht,aber auch das hat man schnell raus.
Fa il suo lavoro in maniera eccellente.Non credo possa reggere a molte cadute ma una volta trovata la sua sistemazione fa il suo egregiamente.
laden die Controller gut auf, allerdings muss man sich bewusst sein, dass die helle Grafik vorne drauf eventuell stören kann, je nach dem wo die Station platziert wird.
Comodo, occupa poco spazio, non sono più in giro i controller, e sono sempre carichi. I connettori mi sembrano un po’ fragili, ma lo posso solo dire col tempo.  Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo !!
Habe die Ladestation zusätzlich zur Playsation Halterung geholt. Es ist aufjedenfall praktisch beim Laden und sieht schick aus. Erfüllt seinen Zweck für den kleinen Bruder, dem es gefallen hat.
Perfetto. Arrivato molto in anticipo e perfettamente imballato. Joystick sempre carichi e in ordine. Bello esteticamente e pochissimo ingombro. Comode le luci davanti che indicano la carica.

Die Ladestation ist super und lädt die Controller schnell aufDa ein Controller nicht mehr richtig geladen hat weil was kaputt war kaufte ich mir diese Station und seit dem lädt der Controller einwandfrei
Hat nur auf beiden permanent grün geleuchtet. Controller wurden nicht geladen. Mit verschiedenen Stromquellen und Kabeln probiert. Ging zurück. Preislich zu hoch für das Ding.

Carica i controller molto velocemente e la carica dura anche di più di quando si caricano normalmente. I joystick sono molto semplici da piazzare e c’è un indicatore led che ti dice se sono carichi o si stanno caricando.
Perfetta basetta per doppio controller.Ottima la luce di fine carica che cambia colore(da rosso a verde).
Semplicemente perfetto! Pratico comodo immediato e tiene in ordine i dualshok!! 0 difetti e super consigliato!
Preso da 10 gg come in foto , sembra robusto e ricarica come dovrebbe dati 4 stelle per precauzione ..vediamo come va con il tempo..
Ho avuto modo di provarlo solo per 2 giorni ma il prodotto sembra essere ottimo, per 15 euro lo consiglio
Per 12 euro è un ottimo accessorio, fondamentale direi.Ricarica il joypad in circa 2 ore e la carica dura abbastanza.

Die Halterung tut was sie soll, sieht ganz gut aus und zeigt an, wann welcher Controller fertig geladen ist.Ansonsten liegen die Controller nicht sinnlos rum, sondern recht ordentlich aufbewahrt. Eine ausschaltbare Steckdose ist für den Anschluss von Vorteil.
Comodissimo, ricarica i due controller della PS4 e mostra lo stato di ricarica tramite due led colorati. Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo

Sie funktionieren immerhin in ihrer Funktion, die Controller zu laden.Die Anzeige zeigt bei einer Station immer alle Controller grün an, obwohl er geladen wird. So wirklich geil sind die Dinger nicht, tun aber was sie sollen, auch wenn man nach den ersten tests sehr skeptisch ist.
Degno sostituto dei cavi di ricarica (a me non funzionava più la porta usb del DualShock)  che vendono al game stop a più di €30! Inoltre rende la postazione della play più ordinata

...SEMPLICEMENTE stupendo e funzionale......con led indicatori di carica...cavo...ma senza caricatore a muro....facilmente reperibile....basta trovare un 5v 2A......... cercavo proprio una cosa del genere avendo i joipad con la cover è l unico che li carica senza problemi... consigliatissimo..
Ich habe das Ladegerät gekauft für die zwei Controler unserer Playstation. Sie werden sehr schnell aufgeladen und man kann den Ladezustand auch direkt am Ladegerät sehen.
controller adesso sempre carichi grazie a questo carica controller. Ottimo. Da provare e non ve ne pentirete
Gerät funktioniert- den Ladestatus sieht man leider nicht, aber es ist sauber und vor allem liegen die Teile nicht mehr herum. Geladen wird nacheinander und nicht gleichzeitig.
I full tried and absolutely like it! it's cheap, easy to use and fast Charging!! it is better than what i bought in MediaMarkt!! a single charger cost 9,99€ then after a month it was broken!
Oggetto semplice ed efficace.Ottimo rapporto qualità - prezzo.
Ordine sul tavolo. Precisione dell'innesto. Led rosso/verde di ricarica visibili e carini...Tutto quello che serve per cui lo si compra!
Qualitativ gibt es sicher bessere Ladestationen, aber für meine Zwecke reicht diese auf jeden Fall.Für den Preis aber absolut in Ordnung.
Eine gute Ladestation,die die Controller nicht rumfliegen lässt. Die Controller werden kinderleicht damit geladen
Assolutamente comodo e di estetica x tenere i joypad sempre carichi .. consigliatissimo!!
Comodo e poco ingombrante per chi vuole caricare due joystick contemporaneamenteLo consiglio
Avevo sempre i Dualshok 4 sparsi per la camera e scarichi, con questo ho risolto ogni problema

Tut was es soll. Habe noch nicht so drauf geachtet wie lang eine Ladung dauert aber ich meine nach so 2 Stunden war der Controller voll.Gut finde ich das die USB Ports nicht benötigt werden.

Good PS4 controller charger.  Easy to use and it can be charged via a USB supply if you want, which is a bonus.  Seems to charge my controllers at the same rate as the official charger.  It has a light at the front of the base, which shows the charging, red for low and green for fully charged.Seems robust and should last a good time until the PS5 comes out.

Excellent value PS4 Controller Charging Dock from BEBONCOOL. It charges our controllers just as well as the proprietary brand, but at a fraction of the purchase price. Just as quick, just as much charge and no extra hassles. Couldn't be simpler to use......just connect to a USB socket with the provided cable, put the controllers in the dock and that's it. Well Pleased!

This charging dock is actually surprisingly good.It isn't made out of the best materials but seems to be sturdy enough. One I figured out where everything goes it makes keeping both controllers charged nice and easy.

Looks a little plasticky, but actually seems very solid. The connections to the controllers are very positive.Display is very clear charging is in progress and when complete (tho it doesnt show actual progress, just when its finished)
For £12.99, this charger is a bargain.It can charge 2 PS4 controllers at the same time, going from flat to fully charged in just a few hours.

I was surprised at this item.  Most rechargers are so fiddly and are often slow to charge.  This is 'perfect' in that you can almost sling the controller at it and it'll get charged (well, not quite, but it's certainly easy to dock).  It's also very fast at charging and has a USB charging cable for other purposes too.

I was looking for a stocking filler for my son, he has a PS4 and two controllers. This allows both of them to be charged at the same time. You connect to your PS4 by USB and power is supplied...it also has the added bonus of keeping them tidy as his controllers are now always put away when he's finished gaming.

This is brilliant, the kids use it overnight, they plug in the USB and put it out the way overnight.It is easy to use, sturdy and discreet. The controllers (PS4) charge relatively quickly and seem to hold their charge just as well as if they were plugged in directly.

This product took a bit of wiggling to get the contoller into the ports properly, but once I did it was fine. The plastic construction of this item was a bit cheap and it was also difficult to place the USB plug into the back.  That said, the LED charging lights were really useful to determine completion.  A good price.

Very handy charger. I plug this into an old phone charger and it works fine. I like the front LEDs that turn red whilst charging and green when the controller is full. Not a fast charge, but more convenient than having to connect a cable to the PS4 directly.

I had been meaning to get a charging dock for my PS4 so this is product’s arrival was good timing.First impressions are sub-par. It comes simply packaged in a cardboard outer with various poorly-worded or badly-translated sentences and bullet-points strewn across it - such as ‘For P4 Wireless Controller’ (I notice they don’t use the word ‘Playstation’ anywhere on the box - probably for copyright or Sony-approved quality standards reasons). There are three boxes on the front stating “PS4”, “Slim” & “Pro” - which are entirely irrelevant as the different Playstation console variants have no bearing on the controllers - which are the same across all Playstation 4 models.

Most of these PS4 controller docks charge the controllers using the USB-micro port on the top but this one, like the official Sony device, charges using the EXT on the bottom edge. I don't think it makes any real difference to the speed of charging but it does look better having your controllers straddling the dock right-way-up. Unlike the official Sony product the connectors on this dock are in a fixed position and the controllers just click down onto them and start charging. The front panel has two indicators that show the current state of each controller, red for charging and green for ready-to-go.There's no mains adaptor supplied with the dock but you can connect the dock to your PS4, so charging two controllers from one cable, or connect it to your existing phone or tablet charger. If you connect to your PS4 make sure that it's set to supply power through USB when it's in standby mode (that's switched off by default) or it defeats the purpose. If you want to charge them faster use a 2.0A mains charger, like those supplied with iPads and many tablets. A USB cable is included in the box but it's not very long and you might want to find something longer for use with mains chargers. I've also seen an identical-looking dock to this one available from other suppliers so it might be worth price-checking to make sure you're getting the best deal. Otherwise it's a really handy and neat solution to keeping your controllers topped up and a worthwhile accessory for your PS4.

We have been using the charging port now for several weeks and it appears to be working well.  The charging unit is compact and is capable of charging 2 controllers at once, with a small display on the front of the unit which shows you if a controller is charging (red) or fully charged (green).  The unit is powered via a USB plug, so you can charge you controllers through your PlayStation and keep everything together.  To charge your controller you simply place it on the docking connection, the light on the controller lights up and the display on the front of the charging unit will turn to red to show that the controller is charging.  The only down side that I have found with this unit is that is you favour wearing a skin on your controller this could hinder the charging of your controller, but other than that we are finding this to be a great charging unit.

This a very good addition to your gaming console setup.  The charging unit itself is an attractive black docking station with lights indicating controller connection.  This is particularly good for keeping your controllers safe and out of the way when not in use.It connects to the Playstation or charging plug via a mini USB lead.  Once you have finished playing you place your controller into the docking station and it starts to charge straight away.  It doesn’t take long either, with room on the docking station for two controllers it is possible that untidy wires connecting controller to PS4 is a thing of the past.

This EBONCOOL PS4 Controller Charger, whilst not being a well-known brand - really delivers. Robust, more than a little water resistant (kids hey?) and easy to set up (the power cable it a little fiddly, but you only have to plug that in once. It's a great piece of kits which works well. The light indicator on current charge levels is large and bright, so you see it even if it's across the room, under the TV cabinet.Lets put it this way, before I got this, the most annoying thing about gaming was finally getting some time to myself only to find that I had to either sit right next to the TV, or at a weird angle near the wall because I had no power and it needed charging. Since I got this, it has never happened. Brilliant. Would recommend.

For PS4 enthusiasts, this is an easy way to charge your handsets overnight (or at any other time) without the PS4 itself running to keep a single handset charged. This will independently charge two handsets at the same time or just one.  Two take about 3 hours to charge. There is an outline of each handset at the front numbered 2 with 1 beneath so that you can easily identify which is which. During charging the outline is red. Once fully charged the symbol changes to green. There is even intelligent charging built in to prevent overcharging. Compatible with Sony PlayStation 4/ PS4 Slim/ PS4 Pro game controller.Simply "plug" the controller into the dock using the headphone port. A provided USB cable then connects to a charging plug (not supplied) or equivalent.

For the money, this is a fairly well-built, well-finished charger, and stands up well in comparison with the  Sony original, which costs three times as muchThe lights for charging and docking let you check you’ve done what you intended. The charging  indicator helps you to see when the controller is fully charged. The double-slant controller holders make it easy to charge two controllers at once

This twin charging station features light display to indicate charge status.  Unusually the controllers sit the right way up in the charge cradle which I feel is much better than the upside down seating that many non Sony chargers use. The fit into the cradle is a good stable fit.  I have found in the past chargers that want you to seat the controllers upside down can wobble and damage the controllers  port.Overall I really like this charger but for 1 thing.  This unit has no mains power and instead uses a cable plugged into a USB port, which i know is less problematic these days with many homes have many USB ports to plug into.  My gripe has more to do with the limited ports on the PS4 itself.  So a well made good charger.

BEBONCOOL PS4 Controller Dual Charging StationBoth remotes sit firmly on charging dock. Allows you to charge your gaming remotes ready to pick up and play when you want them.  I really like the lights that tell you when the battery needs charging and when it is fully charged and ready to use.  It comes with a cable but no plug. I have used with a USB plug and charge them from the mains.  The cable is fairly short but is a standard USB cable that you can replace easily if you require it to reach further.  Great product. Very fit for use. And looks nice.

My twelve year old son is forever forgetting to charge his PS4 controllers.  This leads to moaning and whinging when they start to run out of battery.  This charging dock is small, seems well made and has space to charge two controllers at the same time, one piggybacks behind the other.Admittedly you do have to use up one of the two (come on Sony!!) USB ports on the front of the console, but it's fine.  The lead is quite long so it is easy to tuck away and tidy.
Top
Schnelle Lieferung top Zustand
Richtig geil das teil

There's very little to this charger - it's a simple docking station with connectors to charge your PS4 controllers. The base is powered by microUSB connected either directly to your PS4 or to a power socket. The charging is at a decent if modest 400mAh with overcharge protective circuitry. All of these features are pretty standard, so it's hard to get too excited about it, but it does exactly what it's meant to do and means there's less of a reason for cables across the floor charging the controllers in between game sessions.It's a perfectly good charger and considerably cheaper than official Sony merch. Well worth buying.

This PS4 Controller Charging Dock by BEBONCOOL is a good value compact double dock that works as it should and is straightforward to use. My son used it a lot over the holiday period and found it charged his PS4 controllers fairly quickly whichever USB power source he used – no power unit is included with the dock. A handy addition to your gaming accessories this charger is particularly useful when a group is playing together as controllers can be kept ready for use. Currently around thirteen pounds from Amazon the build quality of this charger is OK at the price and should give decent service if used with a bit of care.

This is a fairly simple dock which comes with a USB charging cable and some minimal instructions. The dock has 2 partitions ,larked 1 and 2 so 2 controllers can be charged at one time and a USB slot. There is lights on the front which shows green or red depending on status. I have to admit I am not a gamer and this I was to tidy my son's worktop and even I can see that the worktop is tidier. He however is a dedicated gamer and rally likes this . He tells me it requires no setting up only charging and works great and is easy to useHe is pleased with it

Hooked this up via USB to my boys PS4 and the green lights came on at the front.The controller seems to slot on easily and I haven't had any issues so far getting it to sit correctly. As soon as the controller was docked the corresponding green controller on the front turned red to show it wasnt at full battery. Once the controller is charged the light returns to green

schönes Design, klein und fein

This is a good value charger probably that is simple to use and looks pretty cool too. I like the display that enable you to tell which controller is ready to use, great for hardcore gamers or families with several controllers where the PS4 gets a lot of use. Getting the controllers seated can involve a bit of jiggling but that is more down to the design of the DS4 than the unit itself. Bit strange that is says it charges Pro and Slim controllers etc which may confuse some people as they are the same thing but never mind.

You receive a small charging cradle for two PS4 controllers, the controllers sit upside down, connected to the charging bit.The charger comes with a USB cable, but no mains charger, you’d connect these direct to the PS4.

This is a useful little charging dock that charges two PS4 controllers reasonably quickly via USB. The two illuminated icons on the front display red when charging and green when fully charged. You can connect this to the PS4 but the controllers will only charge when the PS4 is switched ON. Due to this, I have mine connected to a USB plug which works better and obviously more reliable.Recommended!

Plug and charge, very easy to use. USB attaches easily to the PS4, I haven't tried straight to a USB plug socket yet, but I will update when I do. Once you taken of all the protective covering away it is a nice solid looking piece of kit. The controllers fit well not to hard but a solid feeling letting you know it's connected. Display is easy red for charging green for charge. Basic easy and cheap does the job well.

I've got the "sleek" space saving model which comes with a USB cable but no power supply.  Connect it to your PS4 or another device, and so long as the device is powered on you can charge your controllers.  The Led indicator is red to indicate charging mode, it turns green when the controller is fully charged.  It works well enough but a mains charger would have been a useful inclusion for dual charging.

There isn't really much to say about a charging station. The build quality is good so this should survive for a good couple of years until the PS5 comes out.The BEBONCOOL PS4 charge controller was able to charge our controllers within 3 hours. The LED indicators are large and bright letting you know the status of the controller's battery charge.

doet wat het moet. Snelle en correcte verzending ook.
Not at all impressed, only charges one controller, may as well use a charging cable lol
It did not work. Item was replaced by supplier. Second item worked very well. Not ideal that it was not right first time, but customer service was excellent in putting things right!

Broadly speaking, this charging station is very good. Pretty cheap (and therefore a little bit lightweight), but it does what it's supposed to do, and it does it in a decent amount of time. The description says it should take 3 hours to do a full charge of two controllers, but I find it's a little quicker than that.The main thing to remember is that it seems to consider the front port to be "controller 1", and the back port to be "controller 2". If you put a controller on the back port, without one on the front port, it won't charge it. The back port will only charge if there's already a controller on the front port.

Das ist eine Super Ladestation meine Controller laden sich schneller auf als Vorher und das kleine kurze Kabel was mit im Paket der Ladestation war ist auch nützlich mein Handyladekabel ist vor Kurzen kaputt gegangen aber durch denn Kleinen Stecker der mir drinen kann ich mein Handy Gott sei Dank wieder aufladen
Fast charge time

I do like the look of this unit, looks so ugh nicer than a loose wire and having the controller just placed on the side of your TV unit.Charges through the bottom which I find odd but seems to work well, there is a light at the front which will tell you if the controller is charging or not (red for charging and green for fully charged).  I like the look of this unit and even when the controllers are charging but one big issues is the fact it wont charge while your console is in rest mode which is when I tend to charge my controller.  For this I have to remove a star.

Really very good PS4 controller charges. It charges the controllers very quickly, has a light display to indicate when charging and when fully charged; they're nice and portable and neatly stackable for the controllers. Very good design all round.

Very easy to set up. Plug in the charging cable that comes with the dock into your USB socket on your PS4. Slot in your controllers into the dock and it will start to charge. When the light is red the controller is charging, when green your ready to lock and load.

This serves the dual purpose of charging 2 controllers and storing them neatly. So far it has worked well and charges quickly. The only issue is getting the controller at the right angle to attach but I am now getting the knack of it!

Something like this always comes in handy, as you can charge one controller whilst you use the other. Then just swap them around when the one you're using goes flat. Its cool how it lights up and it doesn't take up too much space next to the console either. Great stuff.
This is a good, neat, charger.The controllers fit well into it and it’s easy to see how charged they are due to the led light.
Easy to use and appears to be totally safe and reliable. It's compatible as promised and is definitely cheaper than an OEM charger.
Best charger dock we've had, uses the ports on the top (headphone) rather than the normal USB ones.Work well and looks good.
I like how the controllers sit in the charger as it means they take up by little space. The charger itself feels well made and does the job of charging controllers well.
Just not as long lasting as the official brand.
A very compact charger. Will help to keep things tidy in my son's room. Also makes it easier to charge the controllers.
after couple of days of use it stopped charging.

Eine sehr schöne Aufladestation. Ich hatte keine Lust, das meine Controller irgendwo verteilt rumliegen und nicht geladen sind, wenn ich Sie brauche. (Wie es bei meiner PS3 immer der Fall war) Deswegen habe ich mir diese schicke Station zugelegt. Über die Anzeige ist klar ersichtlich, on die Controller geladen sind, oder nicht. Einzig das einsetzen der Controller ist etwas frickelig, aber auch das bekommt man mit ein wenig Übung schnell hin. Insgesamt eine klare Kaufempfehlung für die Station. Sowohl funktionell als auch ästhetisch zu empfehlen.

Endlich Ordnung neben der PS4. Mich haben unsere zwei Controller gestört, wenn diese irgendwo lagen und dann meistens auch noch die Akkus leer waren. Das hat jetzt endlich ein Ende. Dieses Produkt sorgt nicht nur für mehr Ordnung, sondern ist auch noch sehr nützlich. Die Anzeige zeigt auf einen Blick, welcher Controller bereits voll geladen ist bzw. welchen Ladezustand hat. Ich bin absolut begeistert und hoffe, dass die Ladestation auch über einen längeren Zeitraum seinen Dienst machen wird.

Einwandfreier Artikel, Ladekontakte sind super (Controller werden quasi auf der Gegenseite des Micro USB Anschlusses aufgesteckt) und das mitgelieferte USB Kabel funktioniert einwandfrei. Beide Controller laden ohne Probleme und die Ladestatusanzeigen an der Dock funktionieren sehr verlässlich. Kaufgrund war das beide Controller über Micro USB Kabel samt Netzteil nicht mehr geladen haben.
Funktioniert, wie es soll! Zwei PS4 Controller lassen sich problemlos aufsetzen. Zudem entsteht aufgrund der schmalen Bauweise keinerlei Platzproblem!Kaufempfehlung erteilt!
Bin echt zufrieden! Tut was es soll! Spitzenpreis!
